Review.Titre: Took a whole month to get my lenses
Review.Contenu: Took a whole month to get my vr glasses. Customer service was unhelpful until I pretty much had to reach out 5 times to get some kind of help. My first shipment was stuck in transit and no one helped me and all they would say is "we will keep a look out on it"... horrible service.

Review.Titre: ordered lenes for the psvr2 was told i…
Review.Contenu: ordered lenes for the psvr2 was told i would receive an email 6 - 8 days after ordering telling me the delivery date. 2 weeks later still no email and there customer service team is awful. buyers beware do not use this company total scam. there are far better companies offering the lenes and much much betters service. they ask you to contact there customer services and then dont reply will never use again

Review.Titre: Wrong prescription made
Review.Contenu: I ordered prescription lenses for my Quest 2. I triple checked all info was correct and included a photo of the prescription from the doctor’s office as asked. Two weeks later when they arrived, I followed to video instructions, pausing at each step to make sure I did it correctly. Put it on and everything was blurry as it is normally without my glasses on. Emailed the company and they replied that I must have installed them incorrectly and told me to follow the video instructions. I included a photo of the card they included in the box with what prescription lenses were made and none of the information was what I gave them. They have not offered a refund or a replacement.

Review.Titre: Ordered two pair but received only one…
Review.Contenu: Ordered two pair but received only one pair. Customer support not replying back although I have been following up for over two weeks now. Very unfortunate experience with VR Wave knowing that I have been a customer for many years...

Review.Titre: Lenses insecure in HP Reverb G2
Review.Contenu: Purchased these lenses with the expectation they would correct my vision with the HP Reverb G2 headset. The improvement wasn't as good as I expected; but, even worse, the right eye piece wouldn't stay on the Reverb Lense, it kept falling off. I actually had to tape it in place. I emailed the problem to VR support, and they asked me to make a video of it and send it back. Obviously, that was their way of deterring a customer complaint. I will be ordering a new pair of lenses from another source that has magnetic attachment.

Review.Titre: Good lenses painful fit
Review.Contenu: Prescription came in correct.Lens/lense holder put a ton of pressure on each side of my nose where they contact. Very painful and uncomfortable. I can't play with them on at all. The magnets are nice, but leaving the bands on also put the same pressure on friends who don't need prescription lenses. Big waste of money because I can't enjoy playing while they're on.

Review.Titre: These are the worst vr accessory I have…
Review.Contenu: These are the worst vr accessory I have had the misfortune of coming across.  A prominent sim racing you tuber recommended them so I jumped on it.  I can't speak for other headsets but for the reverb g2 they are shocking.The pair I received came well packaged but the lenses themselves do not fix to the headset correctly and when they do semi hold on the glass itself falls out.  Not as advertised.  I have a new set from a different company inbound but they can't be any worse.

Review.Titre: Worst product experience ever!
Review.Contenu: The lenses sent to me didn't fit on my headset, I immediately reported it to support amd have been going back and forth with support for 2.5 weeks with no resolution. I just want my $68 back and am now getting ghosted! Worst product experience ever!!!

Review.Titre: VR Wave perscription lenses are terrible git.
Review.Contenu: The vision improvement is great but make the quest 2 to uncomfortable to wear for even 5 minutes. Tried returning all Vr wave would say is try glasses spacer or move lenses out. Like I didn't try that before emailing the first time. They would not even return email after the first email. They won't take them back. VR Wave perscrition lenses are horrible and customer service is even worse!!!!!!

Review.Titre: Awful service, go to reloptix!
Review.Contenu: I thought the Index was going to be magnetic, but instead they are press on. As well as taking two months for them do arrive. My roommate ordered from reloptix and they were magnetic, correct prescription, cheaper cost, and arrived within reasonable time. Do your research, as I will not be ordering again.

Review.Titre: Never arrived
Review.Contenu: They shipped 14 days ago with “priority” shipping through DHL. DHL despite having the correct address keeps refusing to deliver, despite having contacted them many times. And VR waves customer support refuse to acknowledge my request to cancel and refund the order. Do not order

Review.Titre: RUN AWAY!!
Review.Contenu: RUN AWAY!!Received defective lens without a magnet, making it unusable. Four unanswered emails to support now. Do not buy from this company!!

Review.Titre: Don’t bother
Review.Contenu: The adapters are extremely difficult to put onto the quest pro because they have too many imperfections. Neither side has come out of their mold correctly. They also have the magnets placed incorrectly and lopsided so the rx lenses that stick on once the adapters are installed, do not sit flush creating an incorrect prescription angle/axis. The lenses themselves don’t look great or provide much clarity. The plastic they’re made of also rub black paint onto my face even after cleaning them repeatedly. It took me over half an hour to get the adapters on and I was only successful because I warmed the plastic slightly so they would fit over the quest pro gasket and into the grooves. (Yes I watched the installation video multiple times). I’ve been wearing glasses for 35 years and had many types of lens adapters for all kinds of devices and do not consider myself new to clicking pieces of plastic together. If you’re a multi player household and need to remove the magnetic lenses for each user, you’re not going to have a good time with these. They’re extremely finicky and fall off with the lightest touch or movement of the pd. I purchased from here because they were the only store with quest pro lenses available for purchase and regret it.

Review.Titre: Did not fit, damaged VR lens, company ghosted!
Review.Contenu: My son got a set of these things, the Rx is correct, but they did not fit his VR headset. He contacted the company and sent them a video to show them the issue. The lenses have scratched his VR screen because of the poor quality and being the wrong size. After a couple of exchanges, the company has not responded to him in over a week. Beware! If yo do have problems, you are probably SOL! (Edit: they emailed my son and told him to break the lenses and video it then send them the video. He responded by pointing out their return policy says they will only issue a refund if the lenses are returned in the same condition they were received in. Interesting. So no, we will return them intact, in the packaging, the printed box as they were received. SMH...)

Review.Titre: I sent them my prescription
Review.Contenu: I sent them my prescription, when I got the lenses the right eye was blurry. They told me to take them to my eye doctor to verify the prescription. My eye doctor said that the PD was not correct. They blamed me for the mistake and said they could not refund me. Buyer beware.

Review.Titre: Buyer Beware.
Review.Contenu: I have purchased 3 sets total. 2 sets for my Oculus 2. They work great. The third set was for my Reverb 2. It didnt last a week. The rubber/plastic holding the lens has deformed. Every time I try playing the right lens falls off. Now the lens has actually come off looks like its glued in 3 spots. I contacted support and they sent me to the install video. That was 3 days ago and Havent heard anything back. I dont know how there are so many good reviews for this product. If you go the Youtube video for the installation there are comments about the same issues I have had. It is a common problem. Please beware!!!

Review.Titre: Very bad after-sales service
Review.Contenu: An update on the review I initially left (below this text). Since I posted the review, VR Wave added a reply to the review which was very polite and asked me to get in touch so they could sort the problem out quickly. I did get in touch, four more times over 2 weeks and have received no communication back from them. It's clear that they use their reply on bad reviews to make it look like they quickly deal with issues but I can tell you this is not the case. I am still waiting for the correct order to be sent to me.Here's my original review...I ordered a pair of Quest lenses and due to my eye prescription being slightly strange (I have issues with my left eye), I followed up with an email explaining that although my prescription did not exactly match my order, I wanted the zero magnification lens for my left eye (to use as a lens protector). They replied quickly saying no problem. They shipped as per my prescription which is not what I asked for so I contacted them and did not receive a reply. I have since emailed them four times and not had a response. They were very quick to reply before I paid but once my money was in, nothing - not impressed. However, I must say the product itself is great.

Review.Titre: Constant spam
Review.Contenu: One purchase from this company and they will send spam almost daily as though this is the type of product purchased weekly.

Review.Titre: Do not buy from VR Wave
Review.Contenu: Do not buy from VR Wave. They are a scam company. I bought my lenses on December 29, 2022. Said they would be shipped within 2 weeks. I inquired about what was going on the 16th of January and they said they were going to work on it. Package says it is still in transit from Hawthorne, CA and has not moved in a month. I will be telling everyone in the VR Community to watch out and do not buy from this company.

Review.Titre: Just received my lenses - JUNK
Review.Contenu: Just received my lenses. Piece of junk. Lenses pop-out of rubber support and do not stay secured.  Lenses do not attach to HP Reverb G2 so as soon as you try to put headset on, the lenses pop off.

Review.Titre: Good lenses, terrible customer service
Review.Contenu: Update: They responded immdeiately to my review but it still took them a few hours more to actually send that email. Theyre sending a return label, trying out the lenses in the meantime in hopes it'd change my mind. Honestly though i havent really noticed a difference between these $70 vrwave lenses and the $20 lenses i got from amazon. Im sure if i actually needed a glasses prescription that these can come with these would be awesome, but for just the anti blue light and anti glare i havent noticed a difference at all honestly. Will update to 3 stars at least once i actually get the return label, send it back and get refunded-------------------------------------------I saw/heard about how good these lenses were from VR youtubers, these looked good so ordered them for the anti glare/blue light stuff, didnt need the glasses prescription part of it so it hurt that they were still $70 after shipping but still ordered anyways. Saw the same kind of anti glare/blue light lenses on amazon for $20 and ordered those in a heartbeat since its way cheaper since i didnt need the prescription part. Tried cancelling my order via support email and chat on the 12th. Today i still got this order anyways, never got an email back from support (after being told to contact the support email specifically by the chat on here) and still got charged the $70 anyways. Emailed support AGAIN and still not a single word from them. The lenses from here are good sure, but really only a better option than the MUCH cheaper alternatives if you need the prescription part as well, if not the cheaper versions on amazon work just as well and their customer support wont screw you over.

Review.Contenu: Where is my order? I'm still waiting over a month for it to be delivered. Of course wanted with you many times but have not heard back once. What is going on with your company? Is this all just a scam?? Where is the product I paid for?

I think that the settings to use are the ones for far vision. Its true that the values I put in the order where the near vision ones but they told me  to send my prescription and they didnt correct my choice so I´m not sure where is the mistake. Review.Titre: Still don't have the product
Review.Contenu: Still don't have the product. And I have no idea where they are and how much longer I have to wait for them. One thing I'd like to recommend would be to keep your customers up to date on where their packages are. Don't have to go as crazy as Amazon where we can literally see where our package is. You could just send an email here and there informing us that the package has been shipped or that it's out for delivery just something so we know that the package didn't just fall off the face of the earth.

Review.Titre: Very painful.
Review.Contenu: Terrible……can I see better, yes. Are they comfortable, no. If I can’t use them for more than a couple minutes before the pain sets in they are useless. They dig into my nose and forehead. I solved this by filing down the top magnet post and rounding off the sharp inner sides. I shouldn’t have to do this and is a major oversight. If you have larger IPD and can set them to setting 3 on the Q2 then you wouldn’t have an issue. I have a 61 which is average.

Review.Titre: Goggle vision is worse than without the lenses
Review.Contenu: Got the DJI FPV lenses.They needed a long time to make them.My vision through the DJI goggles is worse than before.I am far sighted and gave them all the required numbers.Wearing the goggles, the parameters on the left and right side of the screen are blurry.In addition I have to move the goggles up on my face very high in order to see the center part clear.They made the focus point way too low on the lenses.They are not worth the $105 I paid.From what I am reading in the reviews, their customer service is not up to par and I'll dispute the charge on my credit card.

Review.Titre: No support team helped fix my issue.
Review.Contenu: I ordered the set for the HTC Vive Cosmos Elite from them about a month ago, but they sent me two different lens caps. I also tried to get in contact with their support team before the holidays in order to remedy this. They asked for pictures and videos of the set so I sent what they requested, but they responded with an instructional video for the wrong headset. I have been waiting for their response, but none came even after the holidays. It's been so long, that I think they just don't care about the problem now. I'll just issue a chargeback, I'll let the bank deal with their support.

Review.Titre: Brand New Lenses Broken Out of the Package
Review.Contenu: I was super excited to get my lenses after waiting weeks and upon receiving them, first time opening the package, 2 of the lense magnets in the frame were popped out. At first I thought maybe just put them back but they don’t stay in, the fall out and stick to the base making it impossible to play wearing the right lense entirely. After contacting customer support they did to watch the install video and I told them install isn’t the problem because I can’t install them period. The magnets aren’t staying in the frame. I didn’t pay $120 and wait 3 weeks for a bad set of lenses even the lense is perfect but I can’t use them due to the basically broken frame. Im waiting on a response but the only acceptable resolution is for them to replace my broken lenses with new ones because this is frustrating that out of the box they were broke. I’ll be waiting for a response

Review.Titre: Terrible shipping and terrible customer service - 0 stars

I used their chat portal on the site to request a refund/cancel the order, they said "someone would contact me".. a few days later someone did call me to tell me they would not be cancelling my orderer number, but they had shipped my products just now instead, and they do not have a tracking number for me, apparently it is coming from China, which I would have never ordered if I knew that fact, no instead they say on the site the products ship from the US.   OK, so now it has been like 10 days and I still have no products, my order on their site says "Paid, unfulfilled" and I am not happy.   Will not order from vr-wave.store ever again, terrible shipping and terrible customer service.   Good luck!

Review.Titre: Absolute garbage

Review.Titre: Company uses a bait and switch sales…
Review.Contenu: Company uses a bait and switch sales tactic.  Prescription lenses for the Oculus Quest 2 are advertised for $30 but when you go to check out they are really $75.  You can buy non-prescription lenses only for $30.Tried to understand this difference from customer service who was very snarky with me and only offered a 5% discount they give everyone for subscribing to the news letter.UPDATE:Companies response indicates prescription lenses can be purchased for $30; however, as soon as you add a prescription to the lenses, it jumps as I stated before.  Not sure how you can consider plain lenses without a prescription value "Prescription" Lenses.  Still a bait and switch tactic.My suggestion, stop lying to people.  Just put the base rate for PRESCRIPTION lenses and offer Plano lenses without a prescription for $30.  Prescription lenses start at $75 from what I can see.

Review.Titre: Not happy!
Review.Contenu: I recently ordered and received a set of corrective lenses for my DJI FPV goggles from VR Wave. After installing them, as per the YouTube instructional video produced by VR Wave, I noticed the image changed, but was not improved from before they were installed. I contacted VR Wave by replying to an email they sent me-they said I could contact them this way. I received no reply.I then went on their website and submitted to them my experience. Their reply was I should take the lenses to an optician to check if the prescription is accurate. I should not have to do this. It would probably cost more than the lenses and I don't know if I could find an optician that would do it. I sent them an image of the prescription from my ophthalmologist as they requested and I double checked the information I entered on the order form. The eyeglasses I purchased worked fine with this prescription. I replied to their response with the information I wrote above. I will update this review if I can.

Review.Contenu: Product was terrible.Lenses just fall off.

Review.Titre: Kinda disappointed
Review.Contenu: The lenses themselves are great, clean and just right. The problem is they don’t smooth the edges of the plastic frames like they would on glasses. No, theirs are a sharp 90 angle and It leaves very large marks on my face and doesn’t allow me to really get the headset as tight as I want it. Also it’s uncomfortable and limits the time I play with them on. This is with the spacer in on my headset. I’m only on day two with them so still feeling them out but so far I’m kinda disappointed…Update: While removing my headset the frames of the lenses actually cut my face. Working with support now, hopefully they can resolve this. If it keeps taking over a day for a response I’m going to contact my lawyer but I don’t want to do that so fingers crossed.Update 9-10-2021: Support has ghosted me. I’m sure the product will be nice and if it isn’t well, this was a waste of time and money. At least keep the consumer updated and wait till I actually receive the item before asking for a review. They sent out emails saying “your order is complete, here’s how to set it up.” I don’t even have the item yet. Just disappointed on how this company runs things. I’ll add more once I actually receive my lenses. And I can’t even email to the support email you guys sent. It doesn’t exist. Thanks for the help haha.This has been the worst experience I’ve had for waiting for a shipment. Days have gone by and no updates. They continue sending me the same info saying my order will be shipped but over 20 days and nothing. Worse order I’ve made.

Review.Titre: Product is terrible
Review.Contenu: Product is terrible. Support was incompetent and terrible. They have fake people on YouTube manipulating reviews.Worst company ever!

Review.Titre: Reverb G2 lenses. Bad start but happy ending.
Review.Contenu: I needed these for my reverb G2 so I ordered some. Cant fault the service and delivery however I found the product to be very flimsy and poorly made. The lenses are so loose in the rubber cups that just they just fall out when setting the headset down or just trying to clean them. The rubber cups don’t really attach to the eyepieces by anything other than slight tension and can also be easily dislodged by touching them. Not really impressed with them considering the price. They were only reading glasses type too, not prescription lenses.Update 29.1.2021As I said previously I can’t fault their customer service and they quickly sent me a replacement set with no fuss. The first thing I noticed with the new ones was that the lenses were a lot more secure in the rubber cups, which tells me the original ones were defective and I was justified in my claim. All things said and done the product is excellent, including packaging and presentation, and you can rest assured that in the rare event something slips through quality control, they will rectify the issue swiftly.

Review.Titre: Horrible customer service and unknown product
Review.Contenu: Very disappointed and frustrating to deal with. If you plan to place an order, pay, and never plan to contact customer service then they might be ok. Otherwise expect a headache. I placed an order for about 180USD in early March. I have a very strong prescription and sent customer service an email with my prescription and additional instructions that included waiting until a specific day  that week to start production so I could confirm with my doctor what my prescription was (the appointment was scheduled and everything. The date was specific). I was told that if they were able to postpone they would inform me. They never did and shortly after I received an email saying they started production. I thought "fine, I get it. They could have at least contacted me however." I didn't pursue the issue. Received 2 more emails in the coming weeks about how my product was almost ready to ship and in the final stages of production. More than a month after I placed the order I emailed customer service asking what the status was. I was THEN told that my order had not been started and was put on hold and asked me to confirm the prescription that I already sent and was never told needed to be confirmed or my order was postponed. I asked to cancel and refund my order and a week has passed and I have not heard back or received my refund. 0/10 customer service and ?/10 product. Will not recommend to anyone.

Review.Titre: My experience with this company has…
Review.Contenu: My experience with this company has been horrible.  First I placed an order for the prescription lenses on February 8th.  Shipping time is stated 12 -16days.  I received a couple of emails stating that they received the order, working on it, getting ready to ship out.   On February 22nd I receive and email stating that it has shipped and given a tracking number.  I checked the tracking number and it states; Shipping Label Created, USPS Awaiting Item with a date of February 14th.  On February 24th I receive and email that states "We are excited to let you know that we have completed your VR WAVE order. We have forwarded your order to our shipping facility and a tracking number will be sent to your email once available." - so I make a call that the tracking number shows USPS awaiting item.  The representative states that it is on its way and is currently in Carol Stream, IL - I am in Ohio, so I gather another day to two it should arrive.  It did not.  So I contacted them again and the representative said that it is being sent out and should arrive shortly.  He stated that they were sending it out today (Friday the 25th).  I checked the tracking again and it showed again, USPS awaiting item.  I inform him of this and he stated yes it was shipped out today (Friday the 25th) and that it is on the way.  I asked if it was shipped today why didn't I get a tracking number like the last time it shipped?  He stated to be patient and it should arrive soon.  So today, Sunday, I get an email stating "We hope you are enjoy VR WAVE's products!".  Still have not received the product, very unreliable customer service and run arounds are all that I have received. 20 days and still have not received anything.  And to be honest, not even an 'I'm sorry'

Review.Titre: Cant get anything right
Review.Contenu: Prior to ordering through this company all communications were very speedy. I even received my order a couple days early.  Thats where the positive experience stops. After installing the inserts I wasnt able to see any better than with no glasses. When I put my regular glasses back on everything was clear again. After removing the inserts. I tried looking through each one out of the headset. It appears the left lens is the issue. I emailed the company letting them know my problem. Several hours later I received an email with instructions on how to install the lenses. I emailed them back to insure them I had things installed properly. I was then asked to submit photos of the inserts installed. Which I did.  On 10/16 I received another email to let me know they received my photos and they were sending this forward to their production team. After not hearing anything for 5 days I again emailed the company on 10/21 to see what was up. Later that day I got another email. This time I was informed they had processed my replacement. And I should get another email with a tracking number within 3-5 days. After not hearing anything for another 5 days I emailed them on 10/26 asking whats up with my order. Later that day I got another email stating the same thing they told me 5 days prior. The response I sent them was "Seriously? Thats what you told me a week ago". 2 days later on 10/28 I was finally given a tracking number. So I finally received the replacement lenses last night 11/3. Before I placed my original order I contacted VR Wave asking about the new frame design for the quest 2 lenses. They informed me they did have a slimmer design that helped with the touching the nose issue. I just needed to place the order. Then send an email requesting the new design. Although there were issues with the prescription itself, the frame design was awesome. However when I received the replacements they were the old style frames. SERIOUSLY???? Thinking ok Ill just deal with it as long as they work I installed the lenses. When I put on the headset I realized the prescription was even worse than the first set. With the first set at least they got one lens right. This time both lenses were trash. As I said to them in my email, "At this point all I know to say is WTH?. Please just tell me what I need to do to get my money back. I am happy to send both pair back at the companies expense". I have seen a lot of people that are very happy with this company. But as far as Im concerned I DO NOT RECOMEND THIS COMPANY!!!!!!!! Please just give me my money back.

Review.Titre: HP Reverb G2 - design could be a lot better
Review.Contenu: It would seem more thought has went into the design of the Quest 2 lenses than these HP Reverb G2 lenses.  The design is really not great with these lenses.  Some issues I found:The lens surrounds are made of rubber and have to be pushed on which is ok I guess.  However it's not clear in the instructions and videos how much you need to push on the lenses to get them to stay in place.  My first attempt I was pushing them in too far and they weren't staying in place and now I realize I was likely stretching the rubber too much.  My next attempt they weren't push in enough and were falling off.  My third attempt I twisted them a little while pushing them in slowly and eventually they stayed in place.Then I noticed I had some dirt on the lenses so took them off for a clean and both lenses popped out of the rubber!  So overall while these work once they are in place it is an extremely delicate design, which is very disappointing as I would like the ability to take the lenses on and off quickly to let others use the headset.Needs more work.

Review.Titre: Not comfortable at all!
Review.Contenu: Was really excited to get these lenses since I worry my glasses will scratch the VR lenses and putting in contacts any time I want to use my headset is a waste of contacts. Sadly my excitement dwindled about 30 minutes in during the first use. Even with the glasses spacer installed on the face plate these lenses press quite hard against the brow of your eye socket and the bridge of your nose. I usually keep my IPD on position 1 but wasn't able to get my headset tight to my face and was forced to use position IPD position 2 (not a huge deal for me since my IPD is actually dead center between position 1 and 2). After 1 hour of use I took the lenses out and just used my glasses because the discomfort was unbearable. In theory this sounded like a great idea but turned out to be a waste of $80. :(

Review.Titre: the lenses fit on the quest 2 very nice…
Review.Contenu: the lenses fit on the quest 2 very nice ,,the kit comes with plastic pieces with small magnets in them that you put in the quest 2 headset ,, the lenses have magnets too and center themselves to the ones you install in the headset,,  the idea of the small magnets to hold the lenses in is a great idea , easy to remove and easy to put in ,, so you can pass the headset to others and just remove your lenses easily ,, just kinda drop them in and they center themselves ,, but my lenses only are clear if i look straight ahead,, if my eyes look up or down ,right to left ,,, blurry ,, in a vr headset you want to see the everything,,,, not just what is straight ahead ,but sadly with these lenses installed  the quest 2 is  useless to me,, bought a pair of carsons  clip and flip readers for 17$ and removed the attachments and dropped them in and use them now ,,I have to rattle them around a bit sometimes but they work better.. dont use the vr wave lenses at all anymore

Review.Titre: VR-Wave vs VR-Optician
Review.Contenu: I ordered the VR-Wave, AND VR Optician prescription lenses for my valve index. The first lenses I purchased was the VR WAVE lenses. The order was reasonably priced and it came VERY quickly. All of that was wonderful. At first glance I was impressed with VR-wave, but I soon really started to be bothered by the fact that I could only see very clear if I was looking straight ahead. Any time I tried to look around with my eyes (up, down, side to side), it is VERY blurry and so I thought that maybe this is how these type of lenses work. You must turn your head to look around, which was ok, I guess.  I had my doubts however, I mean, regular glasses allow you to look around without turning your head, right? SO I purchased a set of prescription lenses from VR Optician and it was a bit more expensive and took a few weeks to get here but WOW! They are like night and day as compared to the VR-wave lenses. I can see more clearly when looking straight ahead and I can see perfectly when looking around with my eyes too. I spent WAY too much money getting this right, and my only wish is that I had gone with VR-Optician first. They don't cut corners like VR-wave did. I gave VR-wave 2 stars only because the speed at which the lenses arrived from China. Otherwise, don't waste your money. I will be sharing my review of this everywhere I can so that you don't end up wasting your money! :)RobEdit: I forgot to mention, the design of the VR-wave lenses is awkward and has little bits of plastic that is very uncomfortable against your nose. I have a normal sized nose btw.

Review.Titre: there is no difference between with…
Review.Contenu: there is no difference between with lens and without !

Review.Titre: I rarely make a negative review but....
Review.Contenu: Update - they reached out to me and offered me a 50% discount. I declined as I have already ordered replacements (paid for expedited shipping for a reason and didn't want to prolong reordering any longer due to all the email back and forth). If they would have offered this initially I would have been very happy and posted a positive review, but 25% felt insulting to me. However, I did want to update the review that they tried and I will increase to 2 stars for the afterthought. I rarely make a negative review, but this one is called for. I ordered VR lenses. Clicked on the Oculus Quest 2 section. Put in all my information, scrolled back up to make sure I was on the Quest 2 and clicked "add to cart." Where it went wrong is not checking that it was still on the Quest 2 after I added to cart. I should not have assumed that if I filled out the information under Quest 2 that it would change once it went to the cart. How silly of me. I was so excited when the package came. Pulled them out and noticed the shape wasn't correct. Reviewed the email and it said HP reverb. Again, silly of me not to triple check that it didn't change from my initial double check which makes this my fault which I understand and accept. I called customer service immediately. The lady said "send an email." I don't want to send an email, I want to talk to someone about this. She said "send an email, I am the only one here." So I asked her about returns, she said "they are on a case by case basis but you have a product that you can't use so don't worry, they will get it figured out for you." She also said she would have someone call me within 24 hours to discuss but to still send the email. She even verified my phone number. No one called. I received a day and a half later that said since it was my error they could offer me a discount. Didn't even mention what the discount would be. So I asked. They responded another day later and said 25% and they would send me a code if I'm interested. No, I am not interested. I've spent 128 dollars (with shipping) and now I need to spend another 75 plus shipping? So over 200 for a 100 dollar product that I'm sure costs 25 dollars to manufacture. I would have easily agreed to a 50% discount but 25% feels insulting. So buyer beware that the website defaults to another system despite which system you are completing the form for and on top of that customer service is not knowledgeable and has wasted 3 days that I could have used to have another set of lenses being made because they insisted on email exchange instead of a phone call. I will be reordering from a different site. I would rather pay another company more than continue to deal with this one.

Review.Titre: Very frustrating to get a right lens with VR Wave...
Review.Contenu: There is an update for this issue. I just saw an email from VR Wave on Feb, 2nd that they did raise the question about the plus and negative sign. So actually they did a good job for find it out and emailed to me. Unfortunately, either I missed the email or the email arrived later. I just didn't see it for some reasons . Otherwise, it would save both of us a lot of resources and frustrations and we can get this resolved already. However, they had no one mentioned it to me or point it out during recent so many conversations (emails and phone calls). It could be avoid if we had more effective communication.Up to this point, I still have not received any response and solution from VR Wave. I hope we can have a better and effective communication in the future.***********************************************************************I placed the order for my lens on 2/2/2022 from VR Wave website and received it on 3/6/2022 since they shipped it from China or HongKong.But it is totally wrong prescription that I cannot see anything via the lens. After I contacted with VR Wave support by emails and I received the first email response was quite nice and asked me if I like them to make another one. But I asked to find out what's wrong with it. They told me that I put the wrong prescription data but didn't tell me how wrong and which numbers are wrong. I sent emails to ask them and never got the question answered and have no responses... I had to make several special trips to my eye doctor and eventually found out the prescription numbers I entered were all correct numbers but the only thing seems the wrong plus "+" sign and should be a negative "-" sign in front of the prescription numbers. Then I found their support phone number and called them but now they blamed me for entering the wrong data...and not willing to make a correct one or want me to pay the cost... But, honestly I don't think I put the wrong since I am a very careful guy with the numbers since I am a database expert and doing database development, administration and data architect works everyday for last 20 years. They also don't have any proven like screen shot that shows I entered the wrong numbers. I could be but I don't believe I did wrong in general case...However, like most customers, I am not am eye doctor or an optician. We could miss the significant of the meaning for the prescription numbers and those signs. But I wonder the technicians (in VR Wave Wave) should have common senses for it? Or even may raise a question if you have a doubt? That's what we do for our daily jobs. right?!Furthermore, should their website be designed more user friendly for all customers like adding a notice reminding customers for the difference between plus or negative sign? As up to date 3/24/2022 now, they still have not responded to me whether they willing to make another one pair for me or I have to pay for another $145+ for it?I just feel like: am I dealing with a real American company and doing business in USA?

It's 2022-03-08. I haven't heard from the support team. Are they looking into it? are they checking with the delivery team? will I hear back about my purchase. Not a clue.EDIT: VR WAVE team respond to this review that they've sent me an email but I cannot reply to them below. I haven't received any email 20 min after their Trustpilot response (not in SPAM box either). Hopefully, it's just an email delivery delayed.EDIT:  VR WAVE team responded to this review and told me to check my email that I never get. I contacted them on their website LIVE CHAT on 2022-03-09. They said they're sorry and they will get back to me in the next 24-48 hours. It's 2022-03-11 today and I never get my update.EDIT: They emailed me later on 2022-03-11 and providing an invalid phone number that can be found on a tracking website through a google search. However, the information is not valid on that tracking site.EDIT: 2022-03-14 a local delivery agent contact me. He's not from the post office that VR WAVE support team tell me to contact with the incomplete phone number. I told them the phone number is INVALID and they still insist that I contact the number. I'm a local, I know the phone number is missing a digit! In case you wonder, I did call the number and get the exact response that I expected, the call doesn't even go through.The lenses work great (I added an other for that). It helps with the blurriness on my QUEST 2. If you're located at a place with good delivery, maybe it works for you. But it seems so far it hasn't been the best experience for me. My experience with VR WAVE support has been frustrating and unhelpful. Here's how VR WAVE team could do better:1. Provide enough information regarding delivery   - If it's delivered to the local post office, I'd expected to get an update on how I can picked up my product. If not that, then the information regarding how my product will be delivered to me with an expected date. The tracking site is not helpful.2. Provide a better support experience:    - Listen to the customer.    - Research and contact relevant stakeholder to solve the problem.      - Provide reliable relevant information to solve the problem.             - "Follow the tracking website" is NOT helpful when the customer show that it's not accurate            - "Please contact this post office with xxxxxx" is not helpful when the customer already mentioned that it's an invalid number

Review.Titre: Fine lenses, poor attachment. Poor service.
Review.Contenu: The lenses are fine and packaged nicely. The problem is with the magnetic rings that are placed on the Quest 2 lenses. They do not snap into place, and cannot be put on evenly, so the lenses rock back and forth which can cause a scratch. This happened with the first pair of VR Wave lenses I had. I ordered another pair, hoping they had fixed this issue, though it remained. I wrote the company three times requesting advice and they did not respond, which is inexcusable.EDIT: VR WAVE responded to above review stating that they had not received my emails, which were sent to the correct address and were not returned. I sent a fourth one.

Review.Titre: The service needs to be improved
Review.Contenu: The service needs to be improved. Very slow shipping: waited almost more than one week to getting shipping notification. I ordered another pair from HonsVR after ordering lenses from VR Waver , the lenses from HonsVR arrived much earlier with prompt communications.Poor communication. Taking 4-5 days to respond my emails and no shipping information provided, how strange is the buying experience ? I will not recommend the service to other people.

Review.Titre: I ordered these with expectations
Review.Contenu: I ordered these with the impression my left eye is farsighted and assumed since the lenses is right there on your face I should buy them..right lens is basically plain. So received them setup and didn't see a noticable improvement..Further browsing I learned the point of focus in VR headset is actually 2 meters. It's not as reading a book at 15 inches and requires cheaters! Just because you have prescription glasses does not warrant purchase of corrective VR lenses of the several offered on the internet.

Review.Titre: Problematic mount, Lens clarity/quality is high
Review.Contenu: Lens clarity/quality is high, lens mount not so much.  Customer service poorly responsive. Doesn't want to stay in place Lens pops out of the rubber Mountain very easily and pressing on the rubber Mount no matter how I do it is generally unsatisfactory and likes to fall off the headset frequently. Hard to clean the lenses because they tend to pop so easily out of their rubner mount and then it's hard to get them back on without sometimes then popping out of their mount again while you're putting them on.

Review.Titre: Could be better
Review.Contenu: Maybe my prescription, doubtful, but I had higher expectations for the clarity and sharpness of the product in my Quest 2 system. Sorry, but not that great. Better than glasses but still not outstanding or awesome. I keep moving my googles to gain better clarity but its still okay.

Review.Titre: Great lenses! Customer service was helpful but slow
Review.Contenu: When I ordered my lenses I had entered my prescription wrong, about 10 minutes later I email customer support to let them know. They had me send my prescription form so they can use that as reference. Fast forward to when I got them I was disappointed to see they came in that wrong prescription. I was able to get in contact with them about a week after I got them. They were very helpful and sent me a replacement and they're great! They make VR a ton more fun and I'm glad to say goodbye to glare.

Review.Titre: One of the magnets was loose and had to…
Review.Contenu: One of the magnets was loose and had to be glued in by myself to allow the product to work.  This company needs to pay more attention to detail.  Otherwise they work as expected.

Review.Titre: The scrip lenses are excellent, but...
Review.Contenu: The scrip lenses are excellent. I ordered the leather face thing and my order was attempted to be delivered by Amazon Logistics to the wrong state. I am still waiting for it.

Review.Titre: The lenses don't have a right or left…
Review.Contenu: The lenses don't have a right or left indicator, to determine which eye they go on. Maybe you should consider putting them on the lenses.

Review.Titre: Disappointed.
Review.Contenu: Have a HP Reverb G2 v2. I can not get the lenses to fit properly around the Reverb's lenses. Also the prescription lenses keep 'popping' out of the frames.

Review.Titre: Lenses are fine, customer service could be better
Review.Contenu: After some time, I guess they realized sending a new case would be a good idea.  I received them and they are working.  So good on them to finally resolve this.  Honestly, if the cases were for sale, I would have just bought one. Being asked to prove the case was broken was a little odd.  But everything is ok now.-------------------------------------------Lensess are fine.  Customer service is terrible.  I complained about the case the lenses came in having a broken zipper.  I asked if they would sell one to me or exchange mine.  They wanted me to send them a photo of the broken case which I thought was ridiculous for such a low cost item.  I sent the photo and that was the last I heard from.  Honestly the only reason I care about the case is because I share my VR with others need a place to store the lenses. It is impossible to find a case that shape.  But i guess they don't care about repeat business.

Review.Titre: Won’t stay in place
Review.Contenu: The lenses are great.  However, the clips don’t stay affixed to the meta quest pro lens covers.

Review.Titre: Great product, smaller issues
Review.Contenu: Overall these lenses get the job done, the anti-glare reduces most, but not all of the glare, it’s noticeable enough. My only complaints are the 20 days it took to finally arrive (USA) and the fact that they push on my nose and decrease my FOV slightly, you definitely feel it more with super active VR games. I’m satisfied but I wish they were more comfortable.

Review.Titre: Great product, Company can't check inbox
Review.Contenu: I bought thse hearing good things from my friends. Two weeks later, two right lenses show up at my house.I don't have two right eyes.After three emails without replies to VR wave and a really awkward call, they finally got back to me.I didnt give one star because VR wave made amends and sent two left lenses so now I have two pairs, the the product is great, I just wish they knew how to check their email.

Review.Titre: They are a great product but when I’m…
Review.Contenu: They are a great product but when I’m in the middle of a game and I’m sweating they seem to come off and move around. Customer service did reach out but they wanted a Video of this happening which I don’t know how to do when I’m wearing them. So I sent picture. Then they asked for a video of me just shaking the item around but it doesn’t seem to do it if it’s not all steamed up inside. I wish it had better magnets.

Review.Titre: Please read the entire product…
Review.Contenu: Please read the entire product description before you order the Oculus Quest 2 carrying case. Unfortunately, I did not, so I can’t blame VR Wave. The case does not fit the halo strap. Which I find disappointing, since VR Wave sells the strap and the reason I purchased the larger case. Oh well, I’ll still use the case, but I am very disappointed.

Review.Titre: Complete waste of money
Review.Contenu: They were blurry no matter what I tried to do, didn't fit well in the Quest 2. Contacted customer service many times, they finally just ignored me, I assume after the return window had closed. A complete waste of money. UPDATE: After this review they contacted me and agreed to remake the lenses with a different setting. Then last week they said they couldn't make them and they would refund my purchase if I destroyed the lenses and sent verification. Upgrading to 3 stars just because they did finally make it right.

Review.Titre: They fall off all the time
Review.Contenu: They are a great concept but every time I'm playing both of them will fall off and move around in there. Usually it one at a time so I have to try and keep one eye closed. I wish the magnets where stronger so they would stay in place.

Review.Titre: I was really excited and still am about…
Review.Contenu: I was really excited and still am about these lenses except they don't stay in place and keep popping off. They don't snap in place very good and the magnets are popping out as well. Other than that if these issues could be fixed it would be a 5 star product. Thanks

Review.Titre: Issues with my lenses for hp reverb g2
Review.Contenu: Received my lenses for hp reverb g2. Was a little disappointed that they didn’t also have the magnetic mount that vr wave was known for having. Overall seemed like the correct prescription.Problems began when I attempted to install them in the headset. They are a hard plastic frame and when they press on nothing is holding them in place and as soon as I turn the headset they fall out. I kept trying and finally got them to kinda grip and stay in place. I’ll see how they do after using them for a while and will update with any further information.Just received a response to my support inquiry. I’ll update if I learn more.

Review.Titre: Lenses are great, face cover is great, just not together.
Review.Contenu: The prescription lenses are really good. The magnet system works very well when you want to clean them, or when other people want to use the headset.The face cover is also very comfortable to use. Much better than the stock face cover, and still better than the revised oculus cover.What's slightly bizarre is they don't really work well together. The leather on the face cover is too large and hits the lenses. Further, using it I find my face hits the lenses and can knock them out of place. What might seem like an obvious solution, use the glasses spacer, doesn't work as the face cover is not compatible with them.So both are good, just not together.

Review.Titre: Good product/Slow shipping
Review.Contenu: Shipping can be very slowwwwwww….. Ordered lenses on February 20th and finally got them on March 31st. The lenses seem to be a good product. Only 3 stars because of the slow shipping time.

Review.Titre: The prescription lenses are nice, everything else is garbage
Review.Contenu: The prescription lenses are nice, but the halo strap for the quest 2 is complete garbage.I thought it looked really good, better than the elite strap from facebook, when in reality it's cheap plastic and poor design.It barely even fits the head set and bends parts on the headset it attaches too.The back of the head part doesn't do anything and just slides up along with the strap on top not doing anything to gold it in place either. It barely holds the headset on your head, I'm not sure what kind of testing you guys did but it wasn't very good testing. I dont think I'll buy any more of your products unless it involves the lenses because you put out garbage otherwise.

Review.Titre: They work well and I can see fine using…
Review.Contenu: They work well and I can see fine using them. They are also pretty easy to install. The issue is the plastic parts hit the sides of my nose whenever I turn my head just a little bit and it hurts.

Review.Titre: This product took too long to get here
Review.Contenu: This product would most definitely be a five star if the ordering was way easier and the it would get here way quicker but overall really good item

Review.Titre: My vision is clearer but the glasses…
Review.Contenu: My vision is clearer but the glasses move and fog up. There should be a exterior extension and wrap that helps keep glasses from touching your face

Review.Titre: The anti-fog lenses fog up when you…
Review.Contenu: The anti-fog lenses fog up when you play intensive games. On the other hand, the lenses would be great if you don't play exercise games.

Review.Titre: Good, but not great
Review.Contenu: I chose VR Wave because I share the Rift S with my husband and daughter, and I really loved the concept of the magnetic lenses. The prescription is perfect and they are easy to put in and take out, but otherwise I was a little disappointed in the quality. These were more expensive than other VR lens options, but the magnets are so small and weak (one of them even popped out when I first took them out of the box) that the lenses shift very easily while playing and it causes uncomfortable distortions. The placement of the magnets cause the shape of the lenses to sit uncomfortably on the bridge of the nose.Overall these are a really great concept but they need some improvements. Personally I would love if the lenses had larger, stronger magnets so that they fit in more securely, and that the magnet placement took advantage of the extra space above and to the side of where the lenses for, rather than in the middle where it presses on the nose.

Review.Titre: Presses against my nose
Review.Contenu: The frames that hold the VR-Wave lenses press against my nose and are very uncomfortable.  I'm an adult male with an average size nose, I guess--nobody's ever told me I had a big nose.  But these things stick out and around the Oculus lenses (screens).  I have somewhat narrow-set eyes so I use the middle position for the screens.  If I set them to the widest position they barely touch my nose--but then the interpupillary distance is wrong and the screens are not in sharp focus.  Given those issues I'm not entirely sure my next comments are valid--but the lenses don't give me a very good view in VR.  I can only get a sharp focus in the very center of the screen; if I move my eyes up or to the sides it's not very sharp.  I suspect my complicated prescription has something to do with it, along with my astigmatism.  Customer service is outstanding.  I asked for a refund and had no problems getting my money back.  These lenses are a great idea and I hope they can fix the things that gave me problems, because I’d sure like to have them.

Review.Titre: Product 5/5 - customer service 3/5 - proactive communication 1/5
Review.Contenu: I ordered Glases for my Quest 2 and they are great 5/5Delivery took around 2 month. It was stuck for 1.5 month in china (March 2022). This is at a time where China was hit hard with COVID Omicron variant. So if it safes lives im happy to wait. The reason for my avg review based on the communication of customer service. 1) if a situation like this arise simply inform customers. That shipping will be delayed2) When I first ask about my order. I got an answer, they they will look into it. I never got a follow up mail.3) I followed up myself (after a automated mail ask me to review my not received product) and then Customer service offered me a refund or send a new product.👍This is actually a good thing. In the end the package arrived. I guess that also there customer support has a tight control what every emp. is allowed to say. So its probably not even on a specific stuff member. I conclusion be more proactive in your communication. I understand that there could be a worry of mass cancellations if you tell people that there deliver takes up to 2 month. But right now you make it very hard to recommend me to friends, so it will hurt in the long run.

Review.Titre: Utter Disappointment [Revised]
Review.Contenu: Maybe for the right person with a generic face structure, these would be great. However for me, these lenses, to my disappointment, are unusable. They fit too thickly on the Quest 2's lenses, so they bulge out. Resting my headset on my face, these inserts dig into my nose. In addtion, my FOV is horribly altered in that not only can I see the bezel of the lenses, the edges of the lense inserts give off a very jarring fisheye effect when looking anywhere near the edge of the lenses -- a nonexistent issue when simply using my glasses. To top it all off, my vision is blurred when wearing these lesnses, depsite them being given the correct prescription in addition to my extra care to clean the lenses. One month waiting for shipping and $100 down the gutter!Update: While I still cannot recommend these lenses to anyone with a large prescription, I have to give credit where its due. VR WAVE read my concerns and actually offered a refund for my order. I have to recognize their customer service here and solely for their customer service excellence, I'll be changing my review from 1 star to 3 stars.

Review.Titre: Has anyone had weak magnets
Review.Contenu: Has anyone had weak magnets. Not exactly a strong grip at all. Worried they will fall out easily.

Review.Titre: difficult to install
Review.Contenu: difficult to install, does not go on as easy as shown in videos

Review.Titre: Excellent response to problem
Review.Contenu: Excellent response to problem. New part was quickly sent.

Review.Titre: to confusing
Review.Contenu: just make the buying more simple its to confusing

Review.Titre: Good
Review.Contenu: It is nice not to wear glasses. I'm not sure what is but if I'm not looking straight things get blurry again. Don't know if it's a focal point issue or what. They do fog up a bit more then just wearing glasses but that is just a part of VR anyway. Fit is really good and the magnets work well. I'd still recommend them but I can't say if they are better or worse then any of the competition out there. Shipping was fast too so that was very nice.

Review.Titre: My experience!
Review.Contenu: Okay, I ordered for 3 systems.  Not sure of a fluke or what,  but lenses seems to have minor out of focus at the edges.  not sure if this is normal or not.  But will say way more comfortable then trying to wear standard glasses while using VR headsets.  I did try each of the three I ordered, but not for long periods of time each.  Even with this little out of focus issue, I will be ordering another set for my Q3 soon. The three were ordered with my new prescription from my eye doctor, but not what I use everyday.  So possible it is the prescription and not lenses.  I plan to try and order lenses that are previous prescription and see if any difference.  Was told by eye doctor that I had to use most current prescription even though I did not upgrade my everyday lenses to that prescription and stayed with my previous lenses.  Only minor changes, but I feel those lenses work well with vr.  Sorry, If I am not explaining this very well.  More then willing to try and answer any questions you might have on this issue.

Review.Titre: Received Meta Quest Pro lenses with…
Review.Contenu: Received Meta Quest Pro lenses with magnet missing and a loose magnet immediately lost. Contacted VR Wave support and received message to send pictures and video showing issue did just that and then silence. No response after a week. $100 blown. Beware.2/10 Edit - They actually did end up shipping a replacement pair of lenses after about three weeks. The lack of communication had me spooked. Lenses work well.

Review.Titre: Support not receiving properly emails
Review.Contenu: I had an issue with the delivery address, contacted Support by email about it. While they were nice enough to try to fix the issue, it took a very long time to be processed. Each time I sent a reply it was like they did not receive my emails. After multiple emails it went through and my order was properly received.Good overall, minus on the small hiccup from support.

Review.Titre: My son says they are better than…
Review.Contenu: My son says they are better than wearing his glasses or nothing at all, but after awhile they hurt his eyes. He did say that it would hurt his eyes faster without the lenses so maybe they deserve a 5 but the prescription is slightly different than his glasses.

Review.Titre: Happy with purchase & delivery
Review.Contenu: Can’t really comment on the clarity when using as during the time they arrived I’ve had a virus that’s affecting the sight in one of my eyes.  However the quality feels extremely good and the magnetic assembly helps to fit them brilliantly.  No regrets with my purchase, just waiting for my eyesight to return as it was.

Review.Titre: Almost perfect.
Review.Contenu: The lenses are of excellent quality and provide a better visual experience. The mounting magnets are a little weak and sometimes the lenses shift and need to be put back in place. Otherwise excellent overall.

Review.Titre: Talking about the chat asking questions area
Review.Contenu: I havent received my product yet but I am writing a review on the chat area where you ask questions. There was this one worker who was very nice and helpful. I appreciate those kind of workers very much. They explained things easily so I could understand. Thanks Harvey!!

Review.Titre: good lenses, but keep falling out, poor customer service / RECEIVED REPLACEMENT LENSES
Review.Contenu: Ordered VR lenses for my G2. The lenses do not fit properly around the headset's internal lenses. On top of that, the prescription lenses keep falling out of the frames, often when looking up. VERY annoying. And to make matters worse, VR Wave has consistently ignored my emails in that matter - this is not how customer service should be!UPDATE 17August: after putting up this review, the team reached out and has offered to ship a new set of VR lenses. So far so good! I will update this once new lenses are received and testedUPDATE 01September: replacement lenses arrived and they are now faultless. lenses work perfectly now

Review.Titre: Great lenses, customer service could be better
Review.Contenu: The lenses are great.  I am giving it four stars because there was a delay in the supply chain.  The reduction isn't for the delay, it was for the lack of communication about the delay.  They should have let me know via email.  I found out about the delay when I went to their web page looking for a way to contact customer service after my lens order was very late.

Review.Titre: Lens fell out
Review.Contenu: I was happy with the purchase, until I took out the lens to clean them. The left lens fell out of the frame onto the floor. I have no way of telling which way is the correct way to put it back into the frame. I contacted VR Wave and hope they will be able to correct this unfortunate experience.

Review.Titre: I ONLY WISH THAT WHERE THE MAGNETS ARE…
Review.Contenu: I ONLY WISH THAT WHERE THE MAGNETS ARE WERE MALE AND FEMALE SO THEY WOULD FEEL MORE SECURE. HOWEVER, I HAVEN'T HAD ANY ISSUES WITH THEM FALLING OUT. THEY WORK GREAT I REALLY LIKE THAT I DON'T HAVE TO WEAR MY GLASSES TO PLAY ANYMORE.

Review.Titre: Updated Review 12th of June 2023
Review.Contenu: -Updated Review-It took some time, but VR Wave finally sent me the right order. I have received my prescription lenses today for the Meta Quest 2 and they are amazing. They got the prescription right, I can see clearly in VR and the lenses themselves feel good and do not cause any discomfort.If I were to only review the lenses here, I would give them a 5★ rating, because the product is that good.But I still cannot even begin to imagine how I have received 2 wrong orders before the right one arrived, when I only ordered one product from VR Wave. I don't even know if the first 2 orders belong to some other people or not.After posting the first Review, Manager of VR Wave Joy reached out to me, to help me get my right order.In the end, they were really helpful, and I hope that my problem was just a special case, and that the customer support at VR Wave are actually helping other people with their issues.Product 5/5★Customer Support 3.5/5★

Review.Titre: The lenses were made to my prescription…
Review.Contenu: The lenses were made to my prescription and it's great to be able to use the headset without glasses!!! So much more comfortable.  I would recommend.

Review.Titre: Takes Pressure Off Of Head
Review.Contenu: The Wave Lenses work well with my Oculus Quest 2 headset. I now have an experience or what is like to Not wear glasses when viewing anything. This is an excellent service by Wave.

Review.Titre: The bases of adapters for Quest Pro need improvement
Review.Contenu: Just received my lens adapters for Quest Pro. Spent two minutes to figure out how to install the bases. Then found the bases are loose and easy to fall out with quick movement. Well, I put some tiny double side tapes above the three clips inside the bases to fix this issue. I compared the design of bases with other venders, it seems the design of these bases don't have the enough grips on the outer area of Quest lens due to the small or short clips. The lens itself look great and been polished around the edges very well. But I did see a little glare but not 100% sure. My prescription is very high but the price asked by VR Wave is the best. Overall, it is still highly recommended.

Review.Titre: They didn't work out for me
Review.Contenu: They didn't work out for me. The lenses were great but the frame is too bulky and with the correct ipd 60 they pressed (hard) on my nose. The company was great about trying to work with me making sure they were installed right etc (Y'all really need a new video). Ultimately the did give a refund.

Review.Titre: No More Glasses
Review.Contenu: Not having to wear my glasses is such a big deal to me.  These lenses are great.  I notice that reading the words in the menu is not exactly as in focus as with my glasses, but pretty darn close.  Inside the game, it's wonderful  Thus the 4 star vs 5.

Review.Titre: The lenses clip in easily.
Review.Contenu: The lenses clip in easily so great to switch for sharing. Came with two sets of magnetic clips so spare (or if you have two headsets?).So much better than faffing with glasses as I have done for last 18 months!Worth it

Review.Titre: Was everything I expected and works…
Review.Contenu: Was everything I expected and works fine. It's a bit tricky to get them to stay of the rubber part of the Index but it seems to stay.

Review.Titre: Only one thing
Review.Contenu: It works great the only thing is that it has a lot of pressure on my nose I’ve had it for a week and I’m still not used to it.

Review.Titre: Bad quality. Lenses fall off and arrived with tiny dents.
Review.Contenu: 1. These lenses do work correctly as per prescription. But that is the only 'positive'. 2. They barely hold onto my HP Reverb G2. The right one stays there pretty well but the left one does not stay on and simply falls off when used while playing. No matter how many times I tried to fit it back on, it keeps falling off anyway. Those frames are soft silicone and it is simply too loose to stay on the left G2 lens.3. I ordered 'anti-glare coating' addon for these lens and when I got them I could see tiny dents on the surface of the lenses straight of out the box. Not sure if it is coating damage or lens damage but both inserts have few of these tiny dents here and there. They do not affect the way I see through the lens though, or at least I can't notice it when close to my eye, but still how come the new product has these issues? 4. VR Wave Support initially responded to my request about left insert falling off by providing a link to installation video. After few attempts I thought the insert is finally in place as I twisted it sideways but it fell off on my eye later again while playing a game. I tried to reach out for help again, even recorded a video of a problem, but no response so far.You can watch my video demonstrating the issue if you search for 'VR Wave left lens falls off' on youtubeOverall I spent almost $100 following the hype and promos from Youtubers but only got a damaged product that can't be used. I either need this solved/replaced or refunded please. I will update this review if I get any response and solution from them.UPDATE:VR Wave team contacted me and offered a replacement for a lens that was falling off. I finally received it. They didn't just send me a rim, but they included a new lens with it as well. And now fits very tight, staying in place as it should. In fact it's more secure now than the right one. Though right one does stay in place, it's more "loose" in a way that I don't need to apply much force to pop it off. While this new left one replacement sits there really nicely. If anything, VR Wave should only use the inserts like that for all of their lenses. I can finally use the product now hence changing the rating considering they were able to help me.

Review.Titre: Product works as expected
Review.Contenu: Product works as expected, manufacturing and shipping took the longer end of the given timeframe

I'm giving a four star instead of a five because once I place the order that was very easy and installed them which was easy I noticed one of the magnets was holding my lenses up because it had not been seated correctly. With a little ingenuity I fixed it myself, which I don't suggest doing, after that they are great I love them I would suggest to anybody who wears glasses to get them.

Review.Titre: Good product.

Only issue I have is these make the nose gap slightly smaller and can press down on my nose uncomfortably at times. Great product just wish they'd add a little padding to the inner nose side of the lenses and they'd be perfect!

Review.Titre: The customer service is very good
