As soon as I emailed them, I had a new pair sent out immediately and they are spot on. It's fantastic not having to wear glasses now when I go into VR.

Review.Titre: Great product Ok deliver time?
Review.Contenu: I order them because my quest keep disconnecting cuz of my glasses space when I move my head so I spend $130 seeing the review from YouTube and Facebook I order them and got a email saying there in production after a week and 2 weeks later I contact the team about my tracking number and in a few days I got it so to sum it up the product is grade and the extract you get with it is helpful but time to get it is a bit long (1/22/2022-2/12-2022) but it’s worth it in my opinion there clear and helpful if you play vr or vrchat

Review.Titre: My experience was average my order of…
Review.Contenu: My experience was average my order of lens was wrong and it took a few emails back and forth to finally get across that the wrong set had been sent, I now have the correct ones and am very satisfied I was also satisfied with the holding case I ordered that arrived in a timely manner...I won't let a mistake stop me from ordering more products in the future...I do feel customer satisfaction is priority.

Review.Titre: Great Vision
Review.Contenu: I only say four stars because the customer service is shut down on the weekends and the phone line is only open M-F for 6 hours. But after finally installing my lenses they are a game changer!! Perfect vision with no glasses! The packaging is great and the lenses come with a nice storage case. There are extra bases for the lenses as well. Very happy!!

Review.Titre: Game Changer for glass wearers! (Quest 2)
Review.Contenu: It took almost 18 days to get my order delivered. I had to keep contacting them to get updates after a week from ordering the lenses. There were no install instructions. Had to watch several youtube videos to get an idea. To install the mounts on the headset lenses were tricky to snap in. But once installed, the wave lenses are then easy to put on. These lenses are definitely a game changer. Its very comfortable to wear them with vr cover interface and feel even more immersed into VR. No issues with lens make so far.

Review.Titre: Worth it for reduced eye strain
Review.Contenu: Ordered non prescription lenses to help with eye strain. These definitely do the trick. I’m able to play longer without feeling like my eyes are going to bleed. Also I feel the viewing angle has become bigger, which is great! The downside is how far they stick out from the original lenses. I had to use the glasses spacer that came with my face mask to get my eyeballs far enough away to be comfortable. Overall this is a great product and I do highly recommend!

Review.Titre: These lenses are fantastic
Review.Contenu: These lenses are fantastic!  The only thing keeping me from giving 5 stars is the shipping, which isn't VR Wave's fault (except for who they chose to use for shipping. Pitney Bowes is horrendously slow.).  But, now they're here and I love them!

Review.Titre: Had an issue but easy path to resolution
Review.Contenu: I had an issue with my initial order (seems like the lens rotation was incorrect) but their support was quick to fix it and ship me a replacement for that lens. It even included an extra case, lens attachments, cleaning wipes and cloth, so that was a nice surprise.Regarding fit, though, luckily I'm on slot 3 for the quest 2 lenses. If I put it on 2 I can feel the lenses resting against my nose a little.

Review.Titre: Overall Happy
Review.Contenu: The prescription on the lenses seem pretty good.  The fit of the mag ring is just okay on my OQ2.  I used free shipping and it took 23 days from the date I ordered to the date I received here in the US.  Overall I'm happy with my purchase.

Review.Titre: From Toronto
Review.Contenu: It is a good product. I received it 5 days after ordering. I feel comfortable using them with my Oculus Quest 2. I see everything is very clear. Although it's a bit blurry when I moved my eyes to look around, that doesn't affect the picture quality and the experience. I hope next version will fix it.

Review.Titre: Initial Poor performance from VR WAVE rescued by Good Customer service
Review.Contenu: VR WAVE  sent the wrong lenses. They sent Oculus Quest Lenses  when I ordered HP REVERB G2 lenses.  When contacted the Support staff claim they sent the correct lenses even though I provided a photo of the incorrect lenses I had been sent.      Once notified of the problem  a new set of G2  lenses were made.  These are great, an excellent product. If only VR Wave's Quality control had spotted the problem BEFORE the wrong lenses were despatched it would have been a 5 star review.

Review.Titre: Game changer for spectacle wearers.
Review.Contenu: Hi everyone I'm blind as a bat without glasses. I just got my VR Wave lenses in and I can play the OQ2 with my family now. Not just watching them cast it to the tv. The glasses insert/spacer that comes with the OQ2 didnt help me at all.

Review.Titre: Love'em
Review.Contenu: Ordered a pair and I love them.  No more trying to adjust my glasses.  Minor gripe would be they're not as easy to swap out when playing with a friend, at least not with the facial interface I have. Of course it could just be that I'm clumsy.  The edge of the interface gets in the way when I try to quickly remove them and reattach them, end up leaving finger prints all over them.  But they are clear, they never get moved out of the sweet spot so the picture is always perfect.  They even seem to resist steaming up when I'm doing strenuous games.  For me they were a great investment.

Review.Titre: Good well made product delivered within…
Review.Contenu: Good well made product delivered within timeframe quoted. Blue light coating is pseudoscience. If you can see blue light through the lens, it doesn't block blue light, despite what the mixed wavelength "test" tool shows you

Review.Titre: Can’t complain
Review.Contenu: Can’t complain. They had problem with the shipping and they compensate me for the delay. Product: it really makes a difference adding those glasses in there. Happy with the product.

Review.Titre: Finally a perfect product
Review.Contenu: Today I received the shipment with a second replacement for my initial order.Now the lenses are perfectly shaped and ground in the plastic rings.Thank you for your efforts to deliver a good product. I am very happy with it.

Review.Titre: Very good quality but a little detail…
Review.Contenu: Very good quality but a little detail that is annoying: the right lens does not fit properly into the reverb g2 and drops from times to times ... otherwise, it is so much better than with my glasses.

Review.Titre: Great job VR WAVE
Review.Contenu: Great job VR WAVE, this product give me the trust and confidence I need in my VR experience. Now my Headset optics are protected, and my eyes are also protected from blue light. Is a win to win deal for me.

Review.Titre: Save money, keep using your own glasses.
Review.Contenu: Great quality lenses that attach with some difficulty, but stay on for the most part. After installing them and using them for the first time, the focal quality was not much different than using my prescription lenses, however was more convenient than having to keep removing my glasses. I thought I would be blown away by the image quality and sharpness, I was not. And I still had to adjust the headset to get a consistently sharp image.For me, not worth spending the extra money to get an image that was similar to my prescription lenses. Company is very responsive and communicates well, however as I said, you're better off just continuing to use your prescription lenses unless you have $100 to throw away.These lenses are over rated for what you get.

Review.Titre: VR wave lenses
Review.Contenu: Ordered these to the UK. They took about 3 weeks to be delivered. They work a treat but they do put some pressure on your nose which can get sore after extended use.

Review.Titre: very good would gave 5 but long time on delivery
Review.Contenu: they are very nice to use alot better then wearing my glasses only thing was how long it took to get them but i love them me and my wife use them for supernatural

Review.Titre: Great Product!
Review.Contenu: Received my lens order very fast. Product was packed professionally, contained helpful information on installation and the lenses were a huge improvement to my VR experience!

Review.Titre: PHENOMENAL OPTICAL POWER!!! shiiiiity little shipper
Review.Contenu: Original ★★☆☆☆: It's been 13 days and my order has just now, possibly shipped. They've been saying for 10 days that it was "in transit", but USPS hadn't processed it yet. So... in other words, it wasn't in transit, it was still being processed. According to the tracking code I only just now was able to get, it might be here by the end of the week. In this time, I've ordered my Quest and been playing with it for 1.5 weeks. I ordered this and the Quest the same day, within the same hour.Edit ★★★★☆: Okay, their shipping is awful, but the product is freaking phenomenal. Guys, if you think VR is supposed to be a little blurry, get this! It's your glasses (or lack thereof) when VRing. Everything is so freaking clear now! It's really changed my VR experience. It would be a perfect score, but you pay the price for the shipper you choose.

Review.Titre: Excellent system and very quick service
Review.Contenu: The only downside to these lenses is that they're thicker than other models in the market which might be a problem if your ipd is low.If it's not (positions 2 and 3) then it's the best system you will find, especially if you share your headset with someone else. Putting the lenses in and out is no longer a problem since they're magnetic.The adapters are sturdy, good quality, they come with 2 spares in case one breaks, the lens are good quality and they come in a very nice package too. For anyone needing glasses this is a million times better, a total must-have for VR.The service was very fast, I got them in less than two weeks (Spain) and the price was also very good even with a strong prescription like mine.Very recommended. I give it 4 stars and not 5 because of the extra thickness of the adapters but if they can change that in the future it would be a 5/5 product.

Review.Titre: It's great not to have to wear glasses…
Review.Contenu: It's great not to have to wear glasses with my Oculus Quest 2. Perhaps the fog problem takes some additional seconds each time to be solved.

Review.Titre: A few issues, but otherwise a happy customer!
Review.Contenu: I paid for expedited shipping, 8-12 days. After 2 weeks, nada movement in tracking. It seems it was sitting in China in customs. I contacted VR Wave, they said they would clear it up. I then got a tracking notice from DHL saying delivery date was in 10 days. I was not happy, contacted VR Wave, somehow it came 2 days later! Well done VR Wave.I received nicely packaged, but I had trouble getting the magnetized rings on my Q2 headset. They did not snap on easily, and I could not get them on evenly. After considerable futzing, i think they are on OK and lenses are secure.Prescription seems good, and it is liberating to see VR without glasses, far more comfortable with a wider fireld of view. I mainly use Q2 for Eleven Table Tennis, a wonderful simulator that is a main source of exercise when i can’t get on a tennis court. I also use a BOBO fan to prevent fogging, and I had a VR Wave cover (pads) that Oculus sent me. The combination of all of this makes VR a delight.

Review.Titre: I bought a pair of Reverb G2…
Review.Contenu: I bought a pair of Reverb G2 prescription lenses and love it. It will be perfect if it come with magnetic design like the quest 2 lenses

Review.Titre: TERRIFIC, but with minor installation issue...
Review.Contenu: First off, the VR WAVE Rx Lenses are WONDERFUL! I no longer have to wear my "Readers", which were previously needed to get a clear and focused image, regardless of the IPD Setting. Comfort is much improved, internal reflections are gone plus, since I no longer have to clean the lenses on the "Readers" prior to use, my OG QUEST ONE is now grab 'n go. Huge improvement in user-ergonomics! So why the 4-Star Rating? The Installation Video depicts installation ONLY on the QUEST TWO, which is designed/built differently than the OG QUEST ONE. It took a bit of fiddling to discover there are bezels surrounding the installed lenses on the OG QUEST ONE which need to be gently pried-off BEFORE installing the magnetic bases on the VR WAVE lenses. Once removed, the rest of the installation went swimmingly. Please include this information either in the shipped package or update your Installation Video. Otherwise, a VERY HAPPY customer. Thanx and Cheers!

Review.Titre: Magnets are Pointless
Review.Contenu: I left a bad review about how much the magnets annoyed me for the Quest 2 lenses, but I finally, after having them for like half a year, figured out how to attach them so the lenses are unlikely to slip or fall off. You have to put them on with both parts stuck together and be careful not to push the bottom part too far.So I'm upgrading my review to 4 stars. Still, I don't see any benefit to having the magnetic attachments. I still think it would be better if they just snapped on like the Valve Index ones. As long as they stay on, you shouldn't have any reason to need to clean inside them, but if you do, the Index ones come off easily enough. So minus one star for that annoying and pointless design choice.These lenses are an absolutely essential accessory for any HMD if you need glasses though. Even though I could use the Quest 2 with glasses (never got them to fit with the Index), I would never want to go back. I buy a pair for every HMD I get, which is 2 so far, and am holding off on getting a Reverb until the lenses go on sale again, because what's the point of having better resolution if you can't see it clearly?

Review.Titre: The lenses work great..
Review.Contenu: The lenses work great... probably 5 stars if the instructions on attaching were just a bit clearer.

Review.Titre: Buyer Beware, Does not fit Rift (CV1) **edited/updated**
Review.Contenu: So, I received my lens yesterday in 6 days, very nice, and the lens are awesome, however, on the order page, my confirmed order, and even the instructional video that VR Wave keeps sending me, it says it will fit Oculus Rift.However the adapter that was sent seems to only fit Rift s and Quest 1....then why have Rift in the titles? I have contacted support to no avail, as of yet. They keep sending me links to the instructional video, which is no help.I will only change my review if and when they help me, or send a refund.The lens do look nice, and the RX was spot on. I hope they do something...so please buyer beware, if you have an older Rift (CV1) they will not fit as the cloth in the faceplate does not allow the removal of the bands around the lens in the headset. I am not going to damage or modify my expensive headset, spent 140.00 with shipping and the addon anti-glare and blue light filters. Very unhappy right now.***EDIT***they contacted me back, and informed me there was a typo on the website, and sent me a refund and coupon code, I hope to see that they will have something available in future, I appreciate that, other than that I still recommend them, the lens were of great quality, and I still would recommend them********

Review.Titre: I wish the magnets were stronger…
Review.Contenu: I wish the magnets were stronger sometimes when I turn my head real fast the lens pops off

Review.Titre: products are good but the shipping cost…
Review.Contenu: products are good but the shipping cost is  high because it is coming from China.

Review.Titre: Nice use Oculus without glasses.
THEIR mistake was expensive for me...
Review.Contenu: Ordered a set during Black Friday.  Got an email back for optical prescription confirmation which I've found very professional since I didn't upload a doctor's prescription.  So far so good... About 20 days later I received the Quest 2 glasses by Canada Post but they made a mistake and messed up the right eye which was confirmed by the plastic prescription card they include with the unit.  I was mad but wrote an email and got a response 2 days later saying they will correct their mistake and send another right eye.  Got a DHL shipping notification from China for it so I was pleased to see that at least they reacted rapidly.  3 days later, I get a 23$ customs bill from DHL... Now I was really mad, wrote another email suggesting I refuse the package and they ship it another way or that they reimburse the 23$ I have to pay.  Got no reply and DHL was saying that the parcel would be delayed so I ended up paying for VR-WAVE's mistake.  Didn't try the glasses on yet...!UPDATE 20211225 The customs invoice was already included in the email I sent. VR-WAVE contacted me a few days ago and offered to pay for half of their mistake which I refused.  In the meantime, the remade lense arrived and this time it was done correctly according to the submitted optical prescription.   The lense is perfect so I added 1 star.  Waiting for a return from VR-WAVE since they said that they will contact their management.UPDATE 20211227 I got a notification for a partial refund technically they refunded me a little more than I asked.  I asked for the additional customs cost of 23$CAN and I received 23$US but it was possibly a mistake!  Upgraded to 4 stars because the product is good but should have been 3.5 because of the hassle.

Review.Titre: Easy
Review.Contenu: Yayssyyssys

Review.Titre: I first heard about VR Wave through youtube and many other options too though i ultimately went with this one due to the Price being faorly good and due to the reviews. Everythin was made perfectly.
Review.Contenu: I first heard about VR Wave

Review.Titre: I can finally enjoy FPV
Great quality, Superb service & fast delivery
Review.Contenu: Great quality, superb service personally reaching out to me to confirm OD & PD info before making the lenses. Half the price of other shops

Review.Titre: They work, installation is finicky but they do work better than glasses..
Review.Contenu: Review by a quality management systems auditor and quality technician. tl; dr They work, watch a YTube vid on installations and be careful. Near or far, they help and don't break the bank. Full review follows...I have the Quest 2 and cannot see far away too clearly, not bad but, I saw these recommended and for the very affordable price, I thought I'd try them. My wife cannot see close up so, we needed to get a pair for her. Both pairs work very well, just as you would expect. They clear up the view for both of us, near or far. The spacer for eye-glasses on the Quest 2 works but, this is sooo much more comfortable.There is a one star removal in my rating (I added one back too though, I'll explain in a moment) because the instructions are not terribly clear. Thankfully, you can look up installation vids online but it still took me two or three tries to get mine on. Once I got the hang of it though, I popped my wife's on with no problem. Just be careful pressing them on. No, you won't ruin your headset, unless you're a ham-handed oaf about it.  As far as clearing up non-vision-related VR blurring & trails, they don't help that. I read reviews that said they help, they don't. But, the product manufacturer never claims they do that anyway.All in all, both pairs were extremely affordable and worth every penny. They came packaged nicely and were in a protective container. The company also sent out a direct email asking about my experience and asking for a Trustpilot review, whether my experience was good or bad, so they'd know how they're doing. That's top-notch, shows they care how they are doing, and I added one star back for that. They also did *not* harass me with spam after my purchase. Just a quick "How'd we do?" and that was it. Great job.

Review.Titre: It takes time to receive your order but...
Review.Contenu: It does take time to receive your order. I partially thought that the order was lost, but I made sure to give the appropriate number of business day according to what was given in shipping time so if you order from this company, make sure to wait the appropriate number of business days (weekends do not count). Anyway, I did get my order in a timely manner, I did not need to contact customer service at any point as everything came at the time quoted, nicely packaged and undamaged. The lenses are great and I see perfectly through them, no discomfort, a definite recommend to anyone looking for VR lenses for various VR headsets. Will order again should/when my prescription change.

Review.Titre: Worth every penny.
Review.Contenu: This is my 2nd pair of perfectly crafted lenses. I added the blue light filter and the headache's have disappeared. High quality and worth every penny.

Review.Titre: The Clarity
Review.Contenu: What a difference using the VR Wave leases the clarity is Fantastic. I would definitely get a pair you would not be disappointed. Thank-You VR WAVE you made it so much better for me to see.

Review.Titre: Great product
Review.Contenu: Great product. Super quick shipping (arrived 7 days from ordering) absolute game changer and I don't have to worry about scratching my lenses or glasses.

Review.Titre: Should be recommended with the headset.
Review.Contenu: If you wear glasses, this product should be about as necessary as the VR headset itself. It should actually be recommended by VR companies and I'm a little disappointed that I had to find out through an ad on IG and not advertised in the box with the headset. It's kind of funny because when your using your "VR wave eyes" but then you take the headset off, your reminded that you actually can't see in the real world.

Review.Titre: Wow! I am stunned!
Review.Contenu: I am an avid user of the Quest 2 for watching 3D movies. Or I should say, I am now! I have over 350 of them and I am very much looking forward to watching them with my headset. I tested the lenses on Avatar, and am truly stunned at the quality. Like night and day, going from glasses to the inserts. I tried to get some lenses from another company and they refunded my money, saying they couldn't fill due to my being slightly farsighted. VR Wave filled my order and delivered an outstanding product in 10 days. I will personally recommend them to friends of mine who wear glasses, as VR is AWESOME NOW! And I haven't even tried any games yet.

Review.Titre: PSVR2 lenses
Review.Contenu: This is the second pair of lenses I have bought from vr wave. First was for my quest 2 and now psvr2 service on both occasions was quick with no issues.Would highly recommend getting prescription lenses rather than wear glasses with the headset it makes the whole experience so much better. Also watch the fitting video on YouTube I initially fitted the lenses upside down, take it from me it makes a big difference.

Review.Titre: Fine Tuning and Clarity Increases Oculus Enjoyment
Review.Contenu: I was putting off getting a pair of the VR Wave lenses until my next eye appointment.  Once that occurred, I immediately ordered a set. What a difference!  The clarity and crispness of my games was awesome!  I could actually see writing within games with more clarity and Walkabout Mini Golf was pristine.  Playing on my Oculus has increased in pleasure tremendously.  The blue light filter has also added to enjoyable gameplay as eye fatigue has been reduced exponentially.  I highly recommend these lenses for anyone who wants more enjoyment out of their Oculus investment!   Thank you!

Review.Titre: A far Better experience
Review.Contenu: VR lenses help propery immerse you into the virtual experience. Glasses take it away, And can sometimes be uncomfortable. Personally, I got a bit of a headache, and almost crossed eyed playing VR for half an hour or more. Thats gone now. So it must have been caused by my glasses and not the VR distorting my vision, because of the rigid and sometimes uncomfortable tight fit inside the headset, even with the  spectical adaptor fitted. Spent a lot on buying a headset and games. So worth investing in lenses, to enhance a long term investment.

Review.Titre: PSVR2 Prescription Lenses
Review.Contenu: Arrived 3wks after I ordered them. They came packaged in a sturdy zip case and I fitted easily the first time. The prescription was perfect.I use them for Driving Simulators and they truly enhance my experience. If I have to take them out so my wife can drive, they come out quickly and easily via small magnets. I would strongly recommend VR Wave. (Wear your glasses without your glasses)

Review.Titre: Excellent quality lenses, amazing for high rx and astigmatism
Review.Contenu: Excellent quality lenses!  I was really worried about ordering these online, but they were affordable enough that I could potentially lose out.  I have a very high prescription (-6.25ish), and astigmatism (-2.5ish) and almost always have to worry about the shape of my glasses lenses causing distortion.  I am extremely happy that there is no vertical or horizontal distortion in the VR wave lenses I got, with a small amount of distortion around the outer ring.  I notice it most in Elite Dangerous where there are linear interfaces in my ship that change angle right at the edge of the lens, but this is fine!  I'm used to spherical distortion when looking a few degrees away from the centre with some of my cheap eyeglasses.

Review.Titre: I did not realize I was half blind untill I used the lens
Review.Contenu: It was a very pleasant experience buying,receiving, and using the presciption lenses. They put the effort to confirm with me the prescription information, the waiting was shorter than I was expected it to be, the install was easy and wow the lenses work wonder. I should have got them earlier! One thing I would suggest would be put a detailed video on how install the base. I spent a whole ten minutes to figure that out. Except that minor suggestions. I am very satified with the order!

Review.Titre: A GAME CHANGER for people with glasses!
Review.Contenu: I like VR but always hated having to cram my glasses into the headset so I thought I'd give VR Wave a shot and OH MY GOD I wish I did this on day 1 of owning my Oculus! No more forehead pain from the pressure of my glasses and I can now play until the headset dies without even thinking about it! These lens are a GAME CHANGER, get them if you truly want to experience VR.

Review.Titre: Crystal clarity without wearing my regular glasses
Review.Contenu: The prescription lenses are easy to order. Due to the way VR works only distance prescriptions are needed. Easy transfer of eye prescription to the order form. Delivery was quick. snapping into the goggles is easy. The magnets allow me to easily remove the lenses for others to use the goggles. Crystal clarity without wearing my regular glasses with the VR headset. I can finally feel comfortable with the VR headset on. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Very happy!
Review.Contenu: Bought a pair of prescription lenses for my Pico 4, they arrived surprisingly quickly to the UK, popped them in, and have to say I'm impressed!  Excellent quality, nice and sharp, massive increase in comfort and clarity.Will be ordering from VR Wave again if (when!) I buy a new headset.

Review.Titre: Very happy
Review.Contenu: I see some comments around response time. My intial complaint was my enquiry about dispatch as i was told a few times they would be dispatched that day when they weren't. However after i guess waiting 8days from order my lenses were marked as dispatched and i was sent a Fedex tracking number by sms. The lenses left on the thursday from China and arrived with me in the UK Monday, i would say that's pretty quick. I ordered lenses for the DJI FPV V2 Headset, the lenses clip on perfectly and now allow me to see perfectly ok without my poxy glasses. Really happy is an understatement. Absolutely do recommend these people, see my other reviews i am genuine and not easily please at all!!

Review.Titre: Great product
Review.Contenu: Just received my lenses yesterday and I’m so happy!  The headset is so much more comfortable now with no more worries of breaking my glasses!  Headaches have gone away too.  What a difference!  Customer service was great.  Quickly notified me when I forgot to upload something during the ordering process and quickly got back to me upon receipt!  VR-Wave is a company I will definitely do business with in the future!

Review.Titre: Huge eye relief
Review.Contenu: These lenses have changed everything about VR for me. I’m sure other players who have bad astigmatisms understand, certain things in VR can be hard to focus on. It also triggers some pretty bad migraines for me. But once I was able to view things through my corrective prescription, the comfort levels in VR went up exponentially. If you need a corrective lenses prescription normally, I highly recommend these. Filling out the prescription online was pretty simple. And shipping was fast.

Review.Titre: I'd honestly say these are worth it
Review.Contenu: I'd honestly say these are worth it. I couldn't imagine using my headset without them. Iam very happy with my purchase and my ordering experience with was top notch from start to finish.  Thank you so much for enhancing my experience without having to wear my glasses or contacts.

Review.Titre: I have been very pleased with my…
Review.Contenu: I have been very pleased with my lenses! I already had the glasses spacer and the Halo headbands. The only initial problem was ordering ask for Plano or Perscription. I needed one lense with a correction and one plano, that was not an available option when ordering. Called and was told to select prescription then select zero for the correction for the plano eye.  Love them. And hope not to ruin another pair of glasses by using the lenses instead.

Review.Titre: VR Wave for my Oculus Quest
Review.Contenu: Lenses for VR Wave for my Oculus Quest came sooner than expected and I was so pleased with the shipping and care.  The lenses were simple to install but feel secure.  The prescription was so accurate and there was an immediate difference.  Other places couldn’t do my RX and I’m glad because these are the best out there!

Review.Titre: Share a Quest 2? Amazing Magnetic Lenses
Review.Contenu: My partner and I share a Quest 2. The lenses are magnetic, so they come off; however, they do not slip off when in use. The lenses also come with a storage holder. The blue light reduction in my prescription VR lenses allows me to play even longer. I enjoy the clarity my VR lenses give me in the game; I can see more details. I will continuously recommend these lenses to anyone who needs glasses for distance and wears uncomfortably glasses with their VR Quest.

Review.Titre: Get the lenses, you won't be disappointed.
Review.Contenu: The experience I now have with my Oculus Quest 2, now that I don't have to wear my glasses in the mask, is beyond comparison.  I truly believe this is why I've been able to get a 9 week streak with Supernatural since receiving my lenses.  Such an easy process (just ask your optometrist for your prescription) and super fast shipping. THANK YOU!

Review.Titre: I ordered the wrong set of lenses for my wife - OH NO!  All is good now!
Review.Contenu: I ordered a set of lenses for my wife, who loves them by the way!  She had two prescriptions, one for computer, and the other for driving.  When I obtained her prescription; I accidentally used the computer prescription.  VR Wave support was actively involved in ensuring that the right prescription was used once I had it.  They even reassured me when I checked to make sure that the right prescription would be used.  Now, she enjoys not having to "force" her cat eyes glasses which are wider than most into the headset, and was pleasantly surprised at how much better she saw the images.  She thought the glasses did well, until she tried the VR wave lenses and immediately remarked to me how nice they were.

Review.Titre: No more glasses to get in the way
Review.Contenu: I just installed my new lenses and I am so excited not having to wear my glasses anymore.  I have bifocals and the lower part of the screen was never clear.  Plus putting the headset on over the frames is difficult and uncomfortable to wear.  This has greatly enhanced my VR experience.

Review.Titre: Impressed with VR Wave prescription lenses.
Review.Contenu: I recently bought prescription lenses for my quest 2 through VR Wave. All of my life I have had really bad eyes with astigmatism. The glasses that I have to wear every day have progressive lenses which make it difficult when it comes to reading things in VR apps and games.I was really impressed though after receiving the lenses. VR focal length does not work quite the same as day-to-day wearing for reading and distance. But after using the lenses I can see a significant difference in clarity when it comes to reading and overall field of view. I also like the fact that the lenses are magnetized so that when I'm with friends it is quick to switch them in and out for others.

Review.Titre: These lenses are fantastic
Review.Contenu: These lenses are fantastic. My wife and I both got a set. Previously the headset hurt to wear because of my glasses. The experience with these custom lenses really improved my experience with Supernatural workouts. My suggestions to the manufacturer is different available frame colors.( I had to paint mine so as to not get confused with my wife's prescription.) More visible "R"  and " L" markings and available suggestions for keeping the lenses clean and smudge proof. I am extremely pleased with performance and increased experience using these lenses. Thank you. Be Well and Good Journey Richie

Review.Titre: Perfect lenses for my PSVR2 Headset
Review.Contenu: I received my PSR2 prescription lenses a few days ago (04-05-2023)I am short sighted (-3.50 on both eyes) and also included the blue light filter in my order. Packaging was appropriate so the lenses were well protected during shipping.Installation was easy and the lenses were manufactured precisely to the specs of my eye prescription. Vision in PSR2 is now great and I can finally say goodbye to wearing glasses when I play the likes of GT7, RE8 and Horizon: Call of the mountain.I highly recommend lenses from VR Wave and believe they are absolutely worth the price.My only minor complaint is, that the included QR code was not linked to an PSVR2 installation guide video. Instead I was sent to a page that listed installation guides to all kind of head sets, just no PSVR2 video. But that is really only a minor complaint in an overall great experience with buying these lenses from VR Wave.

Review.Titre: Want the full experience VR could offer ? BUY IT.
Review.Contenu: Lighting fast service, (7 days from ordering to receiving to Canada) Quality excellent. I Fly gliders IRL and in VR also, so I wear the headset for hours (3-5 hours at a time, depending on the task length.) Switching from glasses to VR WAVE is a life-changing experience.

Review.Titre: An excellent bang for your buck.
Review.Contenu: The lenses were easy to install and work like a charm. The prescription is perfect and the process of ordering was very simple to complete. Would strongly recommend this if you're looking to get a set of prescription lens for a headset as long as you have a recent prescription from your optometrist.

Review.Titre: So much better than blurry!
Review.Contenu: Submitting the order was easy, and they were personable and friendly when they emailed me with a question about my Rx. Took them about two weeks to make my lenses and ship them to me. My eyes aren't quite bad enough that the VR experience was ruined by not wearing my glasses in the headset before I got my custom lenses, but this makes it SO much better! It's like a new virtual world. Have already recommended these to friends!

Review.Titre: Well worth the price.
Review.Contenu: They where great but it was hard to put the outer ring on other then that awesome.

Review.Titre: Would buy again!
Review.Contenu: I purchased prescription lenses for my Quest 2.  These lenses have changed my entire VR experience for the better as I had to wear my glasses while in environment before.  Wearing my glasses while wearing my headset would bend the frame of my glasses and risked scratching the Quest 2 lenses.  Ordering was simple, installation was simple, customer service was awesome!  Would order again!

Review.Titre: Easily worth the money for serious VR players
Review.Contenu: Simple installation, beautiful design and a very communicative seller. Id say these are a must have for anyone who wears glasses and is serious about their VR playtime. I wont be looking back on this product. :-)

Review.Titre: Well Worth the Money
Review.Contenu: Arrived quicker than expected. Fitting the magnetic bases was difficult, but I managed by watching the fitting video. When I put the lenses on the bases, they seemed quite wobbly as if the magnets weren't strong enough. However, once I wore the Quest 2, it was wonderful, so much more clarity than my last lenses (not VRWave), and more viewable area. They do stick out quite a bit, and I can feel them touching my nose, but it isn't uncomfortable. This also means that there is less light leakage around the nose area! There was no slippage or movement from the lenses whilst wearing the headset. They can however be knocked off quite easily when the headset is off. Some kind of lens protection/cover would have been a nice addition. Overall, I would recomment them, they're worth the money despite the little problems (difficulty in fitting, wobbly when not being worn).

Review.Titre: Excellent services.
Review.Contenu: Excellent services.I have made 2 separate orders of prescription lenses spaced 3 months apart. One for me then one for my wife. But in the meantime the company has changed its fixing model. So the 2 magnetic bases were not compatible. They all simply offered to redo my prescription with the new bases for free. Joy.In the end, it's lenses are of very good quality, with perfect vision. I highly recommend them.

Review.Titre: Buy them already!!!
Review.Contenu: Stop reading this review and go buy them!!  I love mine.  Great quality, fast processing time, and quick shipping!!  My VR experience is 10x better, too.  It is so nice not putting in contacts just to use my VR headset.  And don't get me started on trying to use glasses with my headset!  Now go buy them and make *your* VR experience 10x better, too!

Review.Titre: Wasn’t sure at first but decided to…
Review.Contenu: Wasn’t sure at first but decided to give it a try, I used the info that were on my contact lens box (I wear them rarely, I usually wear glasses). Delivery was fast, the product works perfectly and it makes VR way more comfortable and way more fun that with glasses (meta quest 2)

Review.Titre: NOT A SCAM
Review.Contenu: this company is legit their prescription lens work just like your glasses it will have you thinking you’re still wearing them when you have the VR headset on

Review.Titre: Game changer literally
Review.Contenu: Game changer literally!  Works absolutely perfectly for my eyesight!  Worth every penny!  Extremely reasonable in price and so much easier to read and see inside my Oculus ♥️♥️♥️happy camper

Review.Titre: I cannot tell you how happy I am now…
Review.Contenu: I cannot tell you how happy I am now that I don't have to wear my bulky glasses when I use my Oculus Quest 2! No more smudges from moving my head around or adjusting things so my glasses don't slip around too much. Sometimes, I would get frustrated and wear my contact lenses on the days when I would be heavily using the Oculus. Not anymore.It is such a relief to have some wiggle space now. The vision is super crisp and I've had no trouble with the lenses popping off or slipping. I'm very satisfied with my purchase because at first, I was hesitant about spending money and them getting the prescription wrong, receiving poor quality material, or having lengthy delivery times. But that was not the case. Awesome purchase, I definitely recommend them!

Review.Titre: Best purchase for my Quest 2
Review.Contenu: Easily the best purchase I have made for my Quest 2. Easy to install. After using these lenses, wearing glasses with my headset is no longer acceptable for me.

Review.Titre: These lenses are everything and more than advertised
Review.Contenu: I ordered my VR-Wave lenses and they were delivered earlier than I expected - very happy about that.Also found Technical Support to be very friendly and professional.  I contacted them with what I thought was a problem with the magnets and it turned out that they sent two sets of magnets with my lenses and as soon as I removed one set of magnets my lenses are very sturdy and do not move inside my Wave Two Headset.Overall I rate VR-Wave lenses as an excellent purchase and would recommend them to everybody that needs corrective lenses for there VR headsets

Review.Titre: Well worth the purchase. GAME CHANGER!
Review.Contenu: The difference in not having to wear glasses to play VR is a game changer for me. The prescription is excellent and I was very surprised at the delivery time. I thought it would take a few weeks but received then within 10 days.Being able to see and read text in VR clearly with no glasses being pressed against my face even with spacers is so much more enjoyable.

Review.Titre: Great lenses for Meta Quest 2
Review.Contenu: These lenses fit the Meta Quest 2 perfectly. The prescription matched perfectly. The install was super easy. It used to be such a hassle to put on my headset with my glasses. I constantly had to move my headset around, take it on, take it off just to get objects into focus. Now it's great to not need glasses to watch VR. The lenses came in a plain brown box but inside was a nice little holder for the lenses along with a cleaning kit and some type of blue light and filter paper to show you the blue light being filtered if you ordered your prescription with the blue light filter. Lenses even came with an extra set of magnets ( which is what holds the lenses to the headset) which is nice is you treat your stuff like a child. I don't see an adult having to replace or change out the magnets if they remove the lenses carefully when they need a cleaning. Customer service response is quick. I had a question about my order and they reached out to me in 24 hours. The only thing that might remove a star for me would be the shipping/ tracking service used. My tracking number made it appear as if my order was arriving via USPS sooner than expected but then never showed up making me believe that my order had been lost or never shipped. VR Wave responded quickly and solved my issue promptly. If you order from them, exercise patience. From the time I placed my order to the time I received it, it took a month, but it was way worth the wait!! I  highly recommend them if you use glasses and want to  experience VR without them getting in your way. It will definitely make you appreciate and enjoy VR the way it was meant to be watched. Thank you VR Wave!!

Review.Titre: Plano for Index with Anti-Glare and Blue Light Filter
Review.Contenu: Got the plano ones for the index for blue light and glare purposes and it really made a huge difference in my opinion without affecting the comfort of the headset! I've been using them for about a week and a half and I'm very happy with it!

Review.Titre: The lens are amazing works great!!
10 out of 5 stars.
Review.Contenu: 1st. I put in the wrong address and I still got it on time even after they told me they couldn't change the address after it shipped 2nd. Quality out of this world hard case cleaning equipment and extra magnet rings.3rd. Extra mile. I got a certificate telling me they called my eye Dr to verify my prescription. And an awesome blue light testing card to verify the filter works. 10 stars if ot were an option. Gunnq get my wife a pair for her oculus. My vr sick Ness headaches and hurt glasses face have gone completely away.

Review.Titre: So worth the money, a real game-changer!
Review.Contenu: I've been a daily Quest 2 users for a little over a year now.  I use it primarily for fitness games - Beat Saber, boxing and HIIT apps.  I have purchased every possible upgrade to make the experience in VR more comfortable while working out and still had issues with the mask applying uncomfortable pressure on my glasses and with the lenses steaming up and slipping during active play.  These VR Wave lenses have totally changed my experience in VR.  I can see everything in VR totally clearly without the discomfort of my glasses digging into my face and without all the slipping.  The cost was more than reasonable, they arrived so fast and shipped VERY securely.  Installing the lenses into my headset was simple and they fit very securely.  I can't recommend them any more highly, if you wear glasses and spend any time in VR these are a must have.

Review.Titre: I was a bit skeptical...
Review.Contenu: I was a bit skeptical, bought them anyway and NOW I LOVE THEM! I honestly see so much better than with my glasses showed in my headset. Collors are better, image is super sharp and It's so much more confy. If You feel like it could go wrong because You have a stronger perscription, don't worry! I have around -9 on both of my eyes and no problemo. There is only one thing I could say is a bit minus and it's that You can feel the borders of the lenses a bit on Your nose (not painfull or anything but You can still feel them), but if You for some reason hate the touch feeling, just use glass-spacer. Oh and shipping was super fast, even faster than estimated (I live in mid EU).

Review.Titre: Game changing
Review.Contenu: I have a very complex prescription and was surprised these guys could accommodate me! It is delightful to be able to play without pesky glasses in the way. I am 100% going to use their services with every new VR set I buy... honestly, gear providers should just partner with them to make this standard...

Review.Titre: Great product …
Review.Contenu: Easy ordering process and good communication. My prescription is outside what all other manufacturers of Quest 2 lenses can make, but VR Wave just needed a little longer to make them. The lenses are supers, are easy to fit and make using the headset much comfier and easier

Review.Titre: Customer service was very responsive…
Review.Contenu: Customer service was very responsive when I had questions.  Love the product.  My VR experience has much better clarity now. I can actually look down and see clearly when putting in Golf+.

Review.Titre: Makes the Oculus more comfortable
Review.Contenu: Luckily I had just been to the Optometrist and had a current prescription.  I was able to easily fill everything out and send a copy.  The lens work perfectly.  Installation was simple and it is so much more comfortable than trying to wear the Oculus with my glasses.

Review.Titre: Couldn’t ask for a better experience…
Review.Contenu: Couldn’t ask for a better experience with this company. Excellent.

Review.Titre: Best investment ever
Review.Contenu: The ordering process was very easy. Shipping was fast and my son loves them for his VR so he dont have to wear his glasses when playing.

Review.Titre: I used to shove my glasses in my…
Review.Contenu: I used to shove my glasses in my headset and assumed I was seeing fine. Getting lenses for my quest2 was like doing a generational video card update on my pc. The increase in immersion is exceptional. Thank you

Review.Titre: Best purchase
Review.Contenu: Best purchase! No need to wear glasses while working out. Delivery was fast, ordering was super easy. No glare or distortion absolutely Love them!!

Review.Titre: You need to try these
Review.Contenu: These lenses are literally game changing🤯 my headaches and eye strain have decreased significantly and the clearness after getting prescription lenses is absolutely phenomenal. If your really into vr then definitely give these guys a try

Review.Titre: Awsome, would recommend !!!
Review.Contenu: I did order a pair for me, I was about to ask a refund for my VR Occulus 2 since I really need glasse to play .... I was so sad. But then I saw VR Wave making those prescription lens for people like me .... THIS CHANGED MY LIFE. After 25 years of glasses with really bad vision, I can finaly enjoy something without my damn glass on my face. I would recommend this product 200% worth every dollar, plus it was a super fast shipping. My wife will order to.. Thanks again for changing my life .

Review.Titre: Perfect. Absolutely life changing if you love vr.
Review.Contenu: I've have very poor vision my entire life. My prescription is a very high one and very unique and I was ecstatic when i found out VR wave could produce lenses for my prescription. It has completed changed the level of comfort when playing VR.

Review.Titre: Worth it!
Review.Contenu: I rarely write reviews but felt VR wave lenses were worth it.  I was very pleasantly surprised at how much I love these lenses.  Prior to purchasing them, I wore mostly contacts while using my Oculus Quest 2.  I didn't like the comfort of glasses while playing, and my contacts would become dry and blurry if I played more then 20 mins.  Now that I have the new lenses, I can play as long as I want with clearer vision than I had with either glasses or contacts. I purchased them for my daughter as well and we very easily switch out our lenses.  My daughters RX is rather high with astigmatisms in both eyes and she said she sees perfect with them. Game Changer!

Review.Titre: Great products and excellent customer service
Review.Contenu: Have purchased a number of VR headset lenses from VR Wave. Product quality is excellent and customer service is fantastic. When I had an issue with a previous order they made it right. Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: I have no complaints
Review.Contenu: I have no complaints, so glad I ordered it! dealing with putting my glasses on then the headset is so frustrating that my boyfriend recommended this, now I use these lenses more for the oculus!

Review.Titre: These lenses rule!
Review.Contenu: Let me start with telling you I have a severe astigmatism, without my glasses the world is blurry.  I use my Quest to play Supernatural and Beat Saber.  Having to squeeze my glasses into the headset has been a miserable experience.  It is uncomfortable and I still couldn’t see that well.  Enter VR Wave, these have been a Godsend!  I slap them in I can see clearly and no comfort problems.  I play more often and longer now.  This was a smart purchase and I would do it again in a heartbeat.

Review.Titre: I didn’t even consider my prescription…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t even consider my prescription when I bought the VR headset so forced to wear contacts. These lenses are great and the magnet means my wife can use the headset without any bother by simply popping the lenses off. Great lens bag too.

Review.Titre: Lazy guy with less eye strain
Review.Contenu: Now I'm the lazy guy. No I did not test to see if the blue is being blocked with the tester given, I just installed (very easy )and took a long flight in my flight simulators. I did notice I had less strain on my eyes using the plain o lenses because I do not have prescription glasses. So it's well worth the buy

Review.Titre: Great Lenses for the Price!
Review.Contenu: The experience i had ordering these was great, i did have to get a copy of my eyeglass prescription, but i live right near my eye doctor, the lenses are perfect and let me see in VR without scratching my lenses! the lenses are awesome for the price, especially with the magnetic bases they give you!

Review.Titre: These have honestly been game changing…
Review.Contenu: These have honestly been game changing for me. No more headaches from my Quest squeezing my glasses. Reduces fatigue, allowing me to go longer. The blue light demo they shipped with mine was pretty neat and informative as well.

Review.Titre: Rx lenses from VR Wave for VR headsets are terrific!
Review.Contenu: These are great. These are my second set of Rx lenses for the Quest 2 from VR Wave. I am an oldster who wears progressives, so, use your distance prescription. Mine recently changed, and my new Rx lenses from VR Wave were immediately a noticeable improvement. Also, shipping is much faster than they lead you to believe. Don't forget that you are legally entitled to have your IPD... some try and avoid giving that to you. Mine are different for each eye, but VR Wave was able to deal with it. Thanks!

Review.Titre: My eyes/head don’t hurt anymore
Review.Contenu: My eyes/head don’t hurt anymore. I used to constantly adjust the headset in order to “see better”.Now I can play longer without that “sting” in my eyes — and enjoy the overall experience even more.

Review.Titre: No more glasses!
Review.Contenu: Oh, my god. I couldn't believe how cheap this prescription lens was and how perfect it made my VR world look. I was able to play vrchat, beat saber, and zenith with so much excitement. Best investment ever !! It took two weeks for my order to ship. I recommend 1000%

Review.Titre: Customer service exceeded expectations!
Review.Contenu: I ordered these back in Jan of 2022 and after figuring out the right way to attach the lens holders everything seemed to be great. The Rx was done correctly and they made a world of difference. The video card went out in my headset so I had to move the lenses to the new headset and I noticed the magnets were getting rusty. I emailed the company and included photos asking how this could happen. Not only did I get an email back quickly, but they also apologized for the issue and told me a new pair was in production. I was thoroughly impressed by their customer service and their concern for customer satisfaction. The new lenses arrived and I was able to easily make the swap. I think customer service after the sale is the most telling sign of a business. This small business cares which is great. I will always be a customer.

Review.Titre: I had ordered the VR-Wave lenses for my…
Review.Contenu: I had ordered the VR-Wave lenses for my son because he was having difficulty using the Oculus/Meta Quest 2 with his traditional glasses. Ordering was simple, I had entered the data from my sons last eye exam as well as uploaded a photo of the test results so they could be certain that I did not make any errors inputting the numbers. This certainly put my mind at ease. Shipping was relatively quick considering it was a custom item. All together my order came out to around $120 with shipping. I feel this is fair since these are actual prescription lenses signed off by an actual optician. The quality is fantastic! I was able to install these quickly. (Just remember, magnet side goes up.) The magnets hold very well. They will not fall off accidentally, but remove easily without tools if desired. I simply leave them on all the time. I’m very happy with this purchase and I highly recommend VR-Wave lenses for anyone who wears glasses and uses VR. I was not paid to write this, I just really love VR Wave!

Review.Titre: Absolute Game Changer
Review.Contenu: The difference in enjoyment and usability that my wife and I have experienced since purchasing Prescription Quest 2 lenses from VR Wave has been astonishing. The comfort which comes with not having to squeeze my glasses under the mask has also been a huge motivator. We're both using our VR headsets to help with fitness and removing unnecessary discomfort has really helped us be able to work those extra exercise sessions.  I was initially concerned because the order form seemed to be less refined than I suppose I expected. My wife's prescription was very easy to enter. My prescription had both a near sighted and a far sighted lense, an unusual state that the order form even asked you to confirm. Despite the oddity of that one item, the ordering process was a breeze and the lenses were shipped out quickly. Without a doubt, I would recommend this company to anyone who needs vision correction and wants to try to make their Meta Quest 2 more enjoyable.

Review.Titre: A must have if you use glasses.
Review.Contenu: Lenses are an absolute game changer. I normally wear chunky glasses and have a wider face so cramming all of that into the Quest was not comfortable at all. These lenses made it so much more comfortable to use and I don’t have to worry about scratching the quest’s or my glasses’ lenses.

Review.Titre: Get them.
Review.Contenu: When I ordered, it felt like an indulgence. But now I exercise with my headset every day and they make a huge difference in my comfort and immersion into the experience. Only regret is that I didn't order sooner.

Review.Titre: I love the fact that I can now enjoy my…
Review.Contenu: I love the fact that I can now enjoy my Quest Pro to the full without having to worry about fitting glasses under the case.The perfect solution for people who need glasses and want to enjoy VR.  Easy to install - just does the job.

Review.Titre: This is awesome I love that I don’t…
Review.Contenu: This is awesome I love that I don’t have to use my glasses it was so uncomfortable and if anyone else wants to use them they come out and go back in so easy best product ever so worth it

Review.Titre: 100% recommended
Review.Contenu: I'm very pleased with these lenses. I used to wear glasses when using the VR but I couldn't play for more than 30-45 minutes before it got uncomfortable. Now I can stay for more than an hour with no problems at all. They were easy to mount to the VR set and it doesn't feel like they're there. Would totally recommend.

Review.Contenu: Received my lenses today from VRWAVE which it took roughly two weeks from order to receive.It took a minute or two mounting the lenses onto my HTC Pro 2 headset. And the lenses seem well crafted with quality.And Wow! What have I been missing until now I can see clearly as everything comes into focus very nicely. (I'm near sighted)For those on the fence you won't be disappointed.

Review.Titre: Just received my prescription lenses…
Review.Contenu: Just received my prescription lenses and what a difference! No more pain of my glasses twisting in the headset, fogging or causing irritation. I highly recommend them for a better VR experience. Thank you vr-wave for the great service, easy ordering and quality satisfaction!

Review.Titre: These lenses work great
Review.Contenu: These lenses work great. Easy install. Things are much less of a hassle now when taking the headset on and off. Also the chance for eyelid smudging on the lenses is reduced to zero. ( left the eyeglass lens spacer in just for additional space between the new lenses and my face) Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: Amazing VR lens finally I’m able to use…
Review.Contenu: Amazing VR lens finally I’m able to use it comfortably and I can see better compared to wearing glasses. It changed my experience and I heavily enjoy it

Review.Titre: The lenses made were perfect for my…
Review.Contenu: The lenses made were perfect for my prescription. They arrived soon after I ordered. They make using my oculus so much more comfortable. Without them, it used to be a pain wearing my glasses while playing. Glasses used to push up against my face and lenses would get smudged while playing. Love these VR lenses!

Review.Titre: Impressive Attention to Detail in My Order.
Review.Contenu: Ordered these on-line for my META Quest 2. The order process itself was smooth, and I paid and lodged my prescription easily. However, I had made a mistake transcribing my prescription numbers, and VR Wave contacted me to query the numbers I had submitted. I then corrected my error and the lenses arrived pretty quickly thereafter.VR-Wave's attention to detail in checking the prescription was very impressive in an age of on-line order processing where the buyer has to live with their mistakes. That attention reassured me about the rest of the production process, and I was not disappointed.Installing the lenses was easily achived and they transform the VR experience for me. I use VR in Flight Simulator and the ability to read small digits on radios in the VR cockpit and still look outside at the scenery is transformative.

Review.Titre: Good service and quality products
Review.Contenu: Good customer service and great products! Products are good quality materials and the items I have purchased I really like and enjoy using, as they make my VR experience more comfortable.

Review.Titre: 5 stars: Fantastic company you can rely upon.

Review.Titre: Fantastic product

Review.Titre: I purchased these and LOVE them
Review.Contenu: I purchased these and LOVE them! Great field of vision (no distortions). And no more trying to shove my glasses into the Quest 2. I definitely recommend them if you are thinking about it.
